title: Urgent: Upbit KRW Suspension – What You Need to Know About Deposit and Withdrawal Halts
body: BitcoinWorld Urgent: Upbit KRW Suspension – What You Need to Know About Deposit and Withdrawal Halts Cryptocurrency traders and investors in South Korea, listen up! An urgent Upbit KRW suspension is on the horizon, temporarily impacting deposit and withdrawal services. Leading South Korean crypto exchange Upbit has officially announced a brief halt to account verification and Korean won (KRW) deposit and withdrawal functionalities. This temporary measure is essential for system maintenance at its banking partner, K Bank. Understanding the details of this scheduled downtime is crucial to manage your funds effectively and avoid any unexpected disruptions. What’s Behind the Upbit KRW Suspension? The upcoming Upbit KRW suspension is not an arbitrary decision but a planned maintenance event. K Bank, Upbit’s primary banking partner for KRW services, requires a system upgrade. Such maintenance periods are vital for ensuring the long-term stability, security, and efficiency of banking infrastructure that supports crypto exchanges. Think of it as a necessary tune-up for a high-performance engine. Duration: Approximately four hours. Timing: From 5:00 p.m. to 9:00 p.m. UTC on September 24th. Affected Services: Account verification, KRW deposits, and KRW withdrawals. During this window, users will not be able to initiate or complete transactions involving the Korean won. It’s a brief but important pause that requires user awareness and planning. How Does This Upbit KRW Suspension Affect You? For active traders and those planning to move funds, the Upbit KRW suspension directly impacts your immediate financial activities. If you typically rely on quick KRW transfers, this period will require some adjustments. It’s not just about depositing or withdrawing; it also means any pending verifications might be delayed. Here’s what you need to consider: Planning Ahead: If you need to deposit or withdraw KRW, ensure you complete these transactions well before the scheduled 5:00 p.m. UTC start time on September 24th. Alternative Strategies: While KRW services are paused, trading within Upbit using existing KRW balances or other cryptocurrencies should remain unaffected. However, fresh fiat injection or cash-out will be on hold. Impact on Trading: If you rely on fiat deposits to “buy the dip” or withdrawals after “selling the peak,” this window might restrict your immediate reaction to market movements. Being prepared is key to minimizing any inconvenience caused by this necessary maintenance. Navigating Temporary Upbit KRW Suspension: Tips for Traders A temporary Upbit KRW suspension can be a minor hurdle, but with a few proactive steps, you can navigate it smoothly. Experienced traders understand the importance of anticipating such events and planning their moves accordingly. Communication from Upbit will be crucial, and users should always refer to official announcements for the most accurate information. Consider these actionable insights: Check Your Balances: Review your KRW and crypto balances on Upbit beforehand. Set Reminders: Mark the exact suspension times in your calendar to avoid attempting transactions during the downtime. Stay Informed: Follow Upbit’s official communication channels (website, announcements) for any updates or changes to the schedule. Customer Support: While services are suspended, general inquiries can still be directed to Upbit’s customer support, though specific transaction issues might need to wait until services resume. This proactive approach ensures you’re not caught off guard and can continue your crypto journey with minimal disruption. Why Are Such Crypto Exchange Maintenance Periods Crucial? Beyond the immediate inconvenience, understanding the “why” behind an Upbit KRW suspension highlights the crucial role of robust infrastructure in the crypto world. Just like traditional banks, crypto exchanges rely on complex systems that require regular upkeep. These maintenance windows are essential for: Security Enhancements: Implementing the latest security patches and protocols to protect user assets. System Upgrades: Improving transaction speed, platform stability, and overall user experience. Compliance: Ensuring the platform adheres to evolving financial regulations and standards. Bug Fixes: Addressing any underlying technical issues to prevent future problems. Ultimately, these planned downtimes contribute to a more secure and reliable trading environment for everyone. They reflect a commitment to operational excellence and user protection. In conclusion, the temporary Upbit KRW suspension on September 24th, from 5:00 p.m. to 9:00 p.m. UTC, is a necessary step for system maintenance at K Bank. While it impacts KRW deposits, withdrawals, and account verification, it’s a short-term measure designed to enhance the long-term reliability and security of Upbit’s services. By staying informed and planning your transactions in advance, you can easily navigate this brief period of downtime. Always refer to Upbit’s official announcements for the most current and accurate information regarding their services. Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs) Q1: What services will be affected during the Upbit KRW suspension? A1: During the scheduled maintenance, account verification, Korean won (KRW) deposits, and KRW withdrawals will be temporarily unavailable. Other services, such as cryptocurrency trading, are expected to function normally. Q2: When exactly will the Upbit KRW suspension take place? A2: The services will be suspended for approximately four hours, from 5:00 p.m. to 9:00 p.m. UTC on September 24th. It’s crucial to note these specific times for planning your transactions. Q3: Why is Upbit suspending KRW services? A3: The temporary suspension is due to essential system maintenance being conducted by Upbit’s banking partner, K Bank. This maintenance is crucial for ensuring the stability, security, and efficiency of the banking infrastructure that supports Upbit’s KRW services. Q4: Can I still trade cryptocurrencies on Upbit during the suspension? A4: Yes, typically, internal cryptocurrency trading using your existing balances on Upbit should remain unaffected. The suspension specifically targets KRW deposit, withdrawal, and account verification services. Q5: What should I do if I need to deposit or withdraw KRW during this period? A5: It is strongly advised to complete any necessary KRW deposits or withdrawals well in advance of the scheduled suspension time. If you miss the window, you will need to wait until services resume after 9:00 p.m. UTC on September 24th. Q6: Where can I find official updates regarding the Upbit KRW suspension? A6: For the most accurate and up-to-date information, always refer to Upbit’s official website announcements or their official communication channels. Was this article helpful in understanding the temporary Upbit KRW suspension? Share this crucial information with your fellow traders and crypto enthusiasts on social media to ensure everyone stays informed and prepared! Your shares help keep the community alert. title: Dogecoin ETF hits 6x the average ETF volume on day 1
body: New records were shattered yesterday, September 18, following the launch of REX-Osprey’s new U.S. spot crypto exchange-traded funds ( ETFs ). One of them, the Dogecoin ( DOGE ) ETF trading under the ticker DOJE, racked up nearly $6 million in trading volume within an hour. To put things into perspective, within just sixty minutes, the fund generated six times the typical volume of an average ETF launch, which usually sees around $1 million on the first day. “My over/under got destroyed in the first hour of trading…That’s shockingly solid. Most ETFs trade under $1m on Day One,” wrote Bloomberg’s Senior ETF Analyst Eric Balchunas. My over/under got destroyed in the first hour of trading as $DOJE already posting nearly $6m in volume. That's shockingly solid.. Most ETFs trade under $1m on Day One. https://t.co/wjAIowq7NW pic.twitter.com/7z22WIKPy0 — Eric Balchunas (@EricBalchunas) September 18, 2025 ‘New crypto ETF onslaught’ REX-Osprey’s other product, the spot XRP ETF under the new ticker XRPP, likewise beat all expectations , generating nearly $25 million in trading volume in around an hour and a half. “Investors look to ETFs as trading and access vehicles. The digital asset revolution is already underway,” said REX-Osprey chief executive officer (CEO) Greg King in a press release reported by Business Wire . The explosive launch left the market in a state of shock, with Balchunas further predicting ‘a new onslaught’ of ETFs while emphasizing DOJE as a top 5 performer for the year. $XRPR traded $37.7m on Day One, which edges out $IVES for the biggest day one (natural) $ volume of any 2025 launch. $DOJE is no slouch at $17m, which would be Top 5 for year.. out of 710 launches. Good sign for the onslaught of 33 Act ETFs coming soon.. pic.twitter.com/JaQP9ekFIq — Eric Balchunas (@EricBalchunas) September 18, 2025 The SEC opens door for new crypto products In the background, the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) approved new generic listing standards for commodity-based trusts on Wednesday, September 17, allowing trusts that meet defined criteria to list without a separate SEC order. According to the SEC, trusts must trade their underlying assets on surveilled markets while maintaining futures histories or already back ETFs with significant exposure. Additional requirements include daily publication of holdings, net asset values, and liquidity policies. In addition, market makers will face trading limits and firewalls implemented to prevent misuse of non-public information. These developments could potentially open the door for new crypto products beyond Bitcoin ( BTC ) and Ethereum ( ETH ). Featured image via Shutterstock The post Dogecoin ETF hits 6x the average ETF volume on day 1 appeared first on Finbold .

title: Crypto Finance Company Matrixport Signals New Uptrend for Bitcoin! Here Are the Details
body: Crypto finance company Matrixport emphasized the continued resilience of the US economy in its market assessment published today. Matrixport: US Economy Remains Resilient, Signals New Uptrend for Bitcoin The company stated that narrowing credit interest spreads reduced refinancing costs, which offset the negative impacts, particularly from tariffs. In addition, the easing of financing conditions and the increased efficiency of businesses using artificial intelligence create a solid foundation for risky assets. According to Matrixport's report, narrowing spreads historically have often coincided with strong performance in stocks and Bitcoin, so the firm predicts the current market rally could continue. Meanwhile, the report noted that inflation remains the biggest risk. While inflation is still running above target, Matrixport's models predict that rates will fall below 2% within the next few quarters, prompting the Fed to embark on a more prolonged monetary easing cycle. This expectation differs from the general market consensus, as many analysts believe fiscal policy easing and de-globalization will keep inflation high. Despite this, the likelihood of inflation exceeding 3% is low, driven by falling energy and housing costs. Matrixport noted that while the primary catalyst for Bitcoin's next rally remains unclear, a new upward trend has begun. *This is not investment advice. title: Mono Protocol Raises $2M in Private Round and Opens Whitelist: Here’s How Its Unified Balances and Universal Accounts Will Reshape Web3
body: The way people use blockchain today often feels complicated. Balances are scattered across different networks, bridging takes time and money, and users constantly switch wallets and chains to complete simple actions. Mono Protocol is building a new foundation for Web3 that unifies these experiences. With unified balances, instant settlement, and universal accounts, it aims to make blockchain interactions feel seamless. The project has raised $2M in a Private Round and is now running whitelist registration ahead of the presale. Mono Protocol: Solving Web3’s Biggest Problem With a Unified Design Today’s blockchain space struggles with fragmentation. Users maintain balances across several chains, bridges are slow and expensive, and front-running risks cause value loss. Developers face the added challenge of building infrastructure for multiple networks, making the experience complex on both sides. Mono Protocol addresses these issues with chain abstraction technology. By unifying per-token balances, it allows users to hold and use assets from any supported blockchain in one place. Transactions are protected with MEV-resistant routing, ensuring value is preserved during execution. Liquidity Lock technology guarantees that transactions cannot fail, which is a major step forward compared to traditional cross-chain systems. This combination creates a new standard for blockchain interaction. Developers gain access to simple APIs to build cross-chain applications without handling infrastructure overhead, while users enjoy one-click transactions across multiple ecosystems. It marks a shift from fragmented networks to a cohesive Web3 environment where complexity is invisible. One Balance, One Account, One Experience Mono Protocol introduces unified balances, instant settlement, and universal accounts that work across blockchains. This approach makes transactions simpler, faster, and free of the friction users often face today. Instead of managing assets on multiple networks, users interact with a single account and one balance. Liquidity Locks ensure transactions are guaranteed and completed instantly, while universal accounts remove the need to constantly switch networks. Together, these features reshape Web3 into a system that feels like one network rather than many disconnected chains. Utility And Economic Design Of MONO Token The MONO token powers the protocol’s ecosystem. It is used for universal gas payments, protocol fees, and routing execution costs. Developers also use MONO when integrating APIs and SDKs, with staking options that reduce fees over time. For security and governance, MONO enables operator bonding, voting on upgrades, and fee distribution to active participants. Execution bonds ensure instant settlement by introducing guarantees and penalties, while part of the supply contributes to an insurance pool. The economic model includes one billion tokens in total, with an initial circulating supply of 132.5 million. Deflationary mechanics such as buybacks, fee burns, and staking locks help stabilize long-term token dynamics. Revenue is shared across stakers, the treasury, operations, and buybacks, ensuring the ecosystem remains sustainable as adoption grows. Moving Toward A Cohesive Web3 Future Mono Protocol highlights how Web3 can evolve beyond fragmented experiences. By combining unified balances, instant settlement, and universal accounts, it simplifies blockchain use while providing developers with a strong framework to innovate. The project introduces a design where users no longer need to think about chains, tokens for gas, or bridging delays. Instead, the focus shifts to seamless execution and accessible applications that work across multiple networks. With its whitelist currently open at $0.01 following the $2M Private Round, Mono Protocol positions itself as a key step toward making blockchain feel like one connected system. title: BNB Price Soars: Unraveling the Mystery Behind Its Astounding $1000 Rally
body: BitcoinWorld BNB Price Soars: Unraveling the Mystery Behind Its Astounding $1000 Rally The cryptocurrency world was truly abuzz when the BNB price recently shattered the $1000 barrier, reaching an unprecedented all-time high. This remarkable surge left many observers, from seasoned traders to new enthusiasts, wondering about the powerful forces at play. Interestingly, even Binance founder Changpeng Zhao, widely known as CZ, admitted on X that pinpointing a single, definitive reason for this extraordinary rally is nearly impossible. What Fueled the Incredible BNB Price Surge? CZ, despite his humility, offered several compelling insights into what might have propelled the BNB price to such dizzying heights. While acknowledging that many factors remain unknown, he highlighted a few key catalysts that likely contributed to the impressive rally: Anticipation of a Crypto-Friendly U.S. Administration: The prospect of a more favorable regulatory environment in the United States could significantly boost investor confidence across the entire crypto market, including BNB. Such an administration might foster innovation and reduce uncertainties. The Memecoin Frenzy: The recent explosion in popularity and trading volume of memecoins has brought renewed attention and liquidity to the broader crypto ecosystem. This increased activity often spills over, benefiting major assets like BNB. Functional Enhancements to the BNB Chain: Continuous development and improvements within the BNB Chain itself likely contributed to increased utility and demand for the token. These enhancements can range from speed upgrades to new decentralized applications. He also wisely noted that countless other, perhaps unseen, factors are always at play in complex market movements, making definitive explanations elusive. CZ’s Role and the Community Spirit Behind BNB Price While many in the crypto community credit CZ for BNB’s phenomenal success, he humbly stated that his role isn’t that of a technical architect like Ethereum’s Vitalik Buterin. Instead, he views himself simply as a member of the vibrant BNB community. This perspective underscores a crucial aspect of decentralized projects: collective effort and shared ownership. The strength of a blockchain ecosystem often lies in its community’s engagement, developers’ innovation, and users’ adoption. The recent BNB price milestone is a powerful testament to this collaborative spirit, showcasing how a project can thrive through a shared vision and continuous contributions from many stakeholders. It’s a collective journey, not a solo act. Navigating the Volatility: What’s Next for BNB Price? After its historic breach of the $1000 mark, the BNB price has seen some natural fluctuations, currently trading around $988.81 on Binance. This kind of volatility is inherent to the cryptocurrency market, especially after significant rallies. It’s a reminder that market movements are rarely linear. Understanding these market dynamics is crucial for investors. While past performance is never an indicator of future results, the underlying factors CZ mentioned – potential regulatory shifts, evolving market sentiment, and ongoing technological advancements – will undoubtedly continue to influence BNB’s trajectory. Staying informed is key in such a dynamic environment. The Broader Impact of BNB Price Milestones A breakthrough like the BNB price reaching $1000 isn’t just about a number; it reflects growing confidence in the utility and future potential of the BNB Chain ecosystem. It signals to the wider financial world that digital assets are maturing and gaining significant traction as legitimate investment and technological platforms. This impressive achievement can lead to several positive outcomes: Increased Institutional Interest: Higher valuations often attract more institutional investors, bringing greater stability and liquidity to the market. Enhanced Developer Activity: A thriving token often encourages more developers to build on its underlying blockchain, expanding its functionality and use cases. Greater User Adoption: As the ecosystem grows in utility and recognition, so does its appeal to new users, further cementing its position in the broader crypto landscape. The journey of BNB price past the $1000 threshold is a captivating narrative of complex market forces, technological evolution, and community resilience. While the exact reasons remain multifaceted and perhaps unknowable to any single individual, the combined influence of a promising regulatory outlook, dynamic market trends, and continuous platform improvements undoubtedly played a significant role. CZ’s humble acknowledgment of the collective effort behind BNB’s success reminds us that in the decentralized world, true power often lies with the community. This milestone serves as a powerful indicator of the evolving crypto landscape and BNB’s significant position within it, pointing towards an exciting future for the asset and its ecosystem. Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs) Q1: What is BNB? BNB, or Binance Coin, is the native cryptocurrency of the BNB Chain ecosystem. Initially launched as an ERC-20 token on the Ethereum blockchain, it later migrated to its own chain. It’s used for various purposes, including paying transaction fees on Binance exchanges and BNB Chain, participating in token sales, and as a utility token within its ecosystem. Q2: Who is Changpeng Zhao (CZ)? Changpeng Zhao, commonly known as CZ, is the founder and former CEO of Binance, one of the world’s largest cryptocurrency exchanges. He is a prominent figure in the crypto industry, known for his strong advocacy for blockchain technology and cryptocurrency adoption. Q3: What factors contributed to BNB breaking $1000? According to CZ, no one knows for certain, but likely contributing factors include the anticipation of a crypto-friendly U.S. administration, the recent memecoin frenzy driving liquidity, and ongoing functional enhancements to the BNB Chain. Many other unknown market dynamics were also likely at play. Q4: Is BNB a good investment? Investing in cryptocurrency, including BNB, carries significant risks due to market volatility. While BNB has shown strong performance, its future price is subject to numerous factors like market demand, regulatory changes, and technological developments. It’s crucial to conduct thorough research and consult with a financial advisor before making any investment decisions. Q5: What is the BNB Chain? The BNB Chain is a decentralized blockchain network that includes both the BNB Beacon Chain (for governance and staking) and the BNB Smart Chain (BSC), which is compatible with the Ethereum Virtual Machine (EVM) and supports smart contracts and decentralized applications (dApps). It’s known for its high transaction speed and lower fees compared to some other blockchains. Did you find this exploration of BNB’s incredible journey insightful? Coral Protocol rolls out Coral v1 with Remote Agents to simplify multi-agent deployment
body: Coral Protocol has launched Coral v1, introducing Remote Agents to streamline how developers deploy and coordinate multi-agent systems, as per reports shared with Finbold on September 19. The update provides access to production-ready Remote Agents on demand, designed to reduce infrastructure overhead and speed up deployment. For the first time, developers can rent ready-to-use Remote Agents and combine them with their own local agents in a single session, with activity tracked and optimized in Coral Studio through threads and telemetry. Agent developers can list their Remote Agents in the Coral Registry and receive automatic payouts whenever their agents are used. Roman Georgio, Co-Founder & CEO of Coral Protocol, said: “The launch of Coral v1 with Remote Agents embodies everything Coral has been working towards up until now: an AI ecosystem that can accomplish virtually anything through combining distinct agents, each with their own sphere of expertise. We’re excited to see how developers harness Remote Agents to develop solutions that raise the bar in terms of what can be achieved onchain.” Interoperability and collaboration across ecosystems Coral v1 supports Remote Agent creation, acquisition, and customization, backed by Coral’s onchain payment system powered by Solana ( SOL ). Unlike existing frameworks, it allows rules for agent interaction to be set at the protocol level, enabling collaboration and payments to occur seamlessly across multi-agent workflows. By introducing an organizational structure, with separate teams and defined processes dictating how agents interact, Coral v1 aims to overcome limitations in conventional frameworks where agents are treated like callable functions. The release of Coral v1 with Remote Agents, alongside a public registry and automatic payment system, is intended to accelerate adoption of multi-agent architectures. Developers can assemble advanced systems by mixing and matching from Coral’s growing agent library, with the added assurance that agent creators are compensated when their tools are used. Featured image via Shutterstock. The post Coral Protocol rolls out Coral v1 with Remote Agents to simplify multi-agent deployment appeared first on Finbold .

title: Strategic Bitcoin Purchase: Treasury B.V. Boosts Holdings to 1,111 BTC
body: BitcoinWorld Strategic Bitcoin Purchase: Treasury B.V. Boosts Holdings to 1,111 BTC In a move that continues to underscore growing institutional confidence in digital assets, Euro-based BTC asset manager Treasury B.V. has just announced a fresh Bitcoin purchase . This latest acquisition adds an additional 111 BTC to its impressive portfolio, signaling a clear strategic direction in the cryptocurrency space. For those closely following the crypto markets, such announcements are always exciting. Treasury B.V. now proudly holds a total of 1,111 BTC, solidifying its position as a significant player in the institutional Bitcoin landscape. This consistent accumulation strategy offers valuable insights into the evolving perception of Bitcoin as a long-term store of value and an attractive asset class. What Does Treasury B.V.’s Latest Bitcoin Purchase Signify? This recent Bitcoin purchase by Treasury B.V. isn’t just a number; it represents a deeper trend. When an established asset manager like Treasury B.V. consistently increases its holdings, it sends a powerful message to the market. Institutional Confidence: It highlights a strong belief in Bitcoin’s long-term potential and its role within a diversified investment portfolio. Strategic Allocation: This isn’t a speculative gamble but a calculated move, indicating that Bitcoin is becoming a core component of sophisticated financial strategies. Market Validation: Such actions often provide a sense of legitimacy and stability to the broader cryptocurrency ecosystem, encouraging other traditional investors to consider similar allocations. The decision by Treasury B.V. to expand its BTC reserves reflects a growing understanding of Bitcoin’s unique properties, including its scarcity and decentralized nature, which are increasingly valued in today’s economic climate. Why Are Institutional Bitcoin Purchases on the Rise? The trend of institutional entities making substantial Bitcoin purchase decisions is becoming increasingly common. Several factors contribute to this phenomenon, painting a picture of a maturing asset class. Firstly, the macroeconomic environment plays a crucial role. With concerns about inflation and currency debasement, Bitcoin’s limited supply cap makes it an attractive hedge. Moreover, the regulatory landscape, while still evolving, is becoming clearer in many regions, which provides greater comfort for institutional investors. Secondly, advancements in secure custody solutions and financial products tailored for institutions have significantly lowered barriers to entry. Companies can now manage large amounts of Bitcoin with greater confidence and efficiency. This infrastructure development is key to facilitating larger and more frequent institutional Bitcoin purchase activities. Key Drivers for Institutional Adoption: Inflation hedging capabilities. Improving regulatory clarity. Enhanced secure custody solutions. Growing recognition of Bitcoin as a legitimate asset. How Does This Bitcoin Purchase Impact the Broader Market? Every significant Bitcoin purchase by an institutional player like Treasury B.V. contributes to a broader narrative of adoption and mainstream acceptance. While individual purchases might seem small compared to Bitcoin’s overall market capitalization, their cumulative effect is substantial. These acquisitions can influence market sentiment, often leading to increased demand and potentially impacting price action over time. More importantly, they demonstrate that Bitcoin is transitioning from a niche, retail-driven asset to one that is increasingly integrated into traditional finance. This institutional embrace helps to reduce volatility in the long run by providing a more stable demand base. For individual investors, these developments can be seen as an affirmation of Bitcoin’s enduring value proposition. It suggests that the digital asset is gaining traction among those with deep market insights and substantial capital. In conclusion, Treasury B.V.’s latest Bitcoin purchase is more than just an investment; it’s a testament to the ongoing institutionalization of Bitcoin. It reflects a growing belief in its future, solidifying its role as a vital component in modern investment portfolios and reinforcing its position in the global financial landscape. As more institutions follow suit, the cryptocurrency market continues its journey towards greater maturity and widespread acceptance. Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs) Q1: What is Treasury B.V.? The company actively manages and accumulates BTC, reflecting a strategic long-term investment approach in the cryptocurrency space. Q2: How much Bitcoin does Treasury B.V. now hold? Following its latest acquisition of 111 BTC, Treasury B.V. now holds a total of 1,111 BTC. Q3: Why are institutional investors buying Bitcoin? Institutional investors are increasingly buying Bitcoin due to its potential as an inflation hedge, its limited supply, growing regulatory clarity, and the development of secure custody solutions. They see it as a valuable addition to diversified investment portfolios. Q4: Does this Bitcoin purchase affect the market? Yes, significant institutional Bitcoin purchases can positively impact market sentiment, contribute to increased demand, and help validate Bitcoin as a legitimate asset class, potentially influencing its price and stability over the long term. Q5: Is Bitcoin a good investment for everyone? While Bitcoin has shown significant growth and institutional interest, it is still a volatile asset. Investors should conduct thorough research, understand the risks, and consider their personal financial situation before making any investment decisions. title: Coral Protocol launches Coral V1, introducing on-chain Solana payments for devs
body: Coral Protocol has launched Coral V1, a new remote agent system that simplifies multi-agent software deployment. Developers building on the project now have production-ready agents that can be rented, customized, and combined with local solutions. According to a press statement shared with Cryptopolitan on Friday, the platform introduces new capabilities to accelerate artificial intelligence (AI) development on blockchain ecosystems. Users can now access ready-to-use agents on demand while integrating them with their own systems. Every interaction and decision made by these agents is tracked in Coral Studio through threads and telemetry, for developers to have oversight of their workflows. Coral v1 adds remote agents on registry Per the Coral Protocol team, agent creators can list their work in the Coral Registry, a marketplace that pays out automatically whenever their agents are used. This encourages innovation by fairly compensating contributors for the value their software provides. The system debuts with full support for agent creation, acquisition, and customization. Transactions are settled through Coral’s secure on-chain payment network powered by Solana . AI builders can create collaborative systems where agents with different specialties work together, efficiently and competently. Roman Georgio, Co-Founder and Chief Executive Officer of Coral Protocol, said the release came about as a result of years of work directed towards a scalable AI ecosystem. “The launch of v1 embodies everything Coral has been working towards up until now. An AI ecosystem that can accomplish virtually anything through combining distinct agents, each with their own sphere of expertise,” the CEO told the press. Georgio also mentioned that the company is eager to observe how developers employ remote agents in solutions, which could raise the standards for on-chain collaboration. Multi-agent systems have been operationally troubling for AI blockchain developers because traditional frameworks treated agents like functions. This created heavy infrastructure demands and long development cycles, and deployment of any multi agent software was nearly impossible. Another challenge was interoperability, as most frameworks operated in isolation and lacked standardized rules for communication. Agents struggled to coordinate networks, and there was no reliable system to compensate creators, who felt innovation was a big price to pay. Much different to LangChain, Coral’s system allows developers to configure detailed interaction rules for their agents. Most frameworks require agents to function like callable algorithms, but remote agents permit systems to be built around teams and processes, closer to real-world business structures. New feature follows big benchmark performance As reported by Cryptopolitan in early August, Coral Protocol saw success after it outperformed Microsoft’s Magnetic UI by 34% on the GAIA benchmark, a rigorous test designed to evaluate AI agents in complex, real-world scenarios. The GAIA test suite features 450 advanced questions, assessing human-like problem-solving, research, and analytical reasoning. Coral’s results placed it ahead of established large language model (LLM) developers. Caelum Forder, Coral’s Chief Technology Officer, said the benchmark results were proof that the so-called “Internet of Agents” is a reality. He encouraged agent developers to “Coralize” their systems to improve scalability, asking application developers to use the protocol to reduce costs and boost its effectiveness. Coral Protocol has undergone significant changes in 2025, beginning with its rebrand from Ai23T earlier this year. The project also launched its own token on Solana in late April. As of the time of this publication, the CORAL token trades at $0.002069, more than 500% above its debut price but 40% below its all-time high of $0.003474, reached roughly four months ago. The project’s development roadmap for the remainder of 2025 features the launch of Session Contracts, on-chain agent task coordination, and Local Server and Agent Mesh tooling for deployment. Want your project in front of crypto’s top minds? Feature it in our next industry report, where data meets impact.

title: Huawei AI Unleashes Strategic Infrastructure Amid Nvidia’s China Lockout
body: BitcoinWorld Huawei AI Unleashes Strategic Infrastructure Amid Nvidia’s China Lockout In the rapidly evolving world of technology, shifts in global supply chains and geopolitical dynamics can send ripples across various sectors, including the burgeoning cryptocurrency and blockchain space. The recent announcement from Huawei, a tech giant known for its robust innovation, signals a significant strategic pivot in the Huawei AI landscape, directly impacting the global AI Chips Market . As Western nations tighten restrictions on advanced hardware exports to China, Huawei is not just adapting; it is forging a new path for domestic technological independence. Huawei AI’s Bold Move: What’s Driving This Innovation? Huawei recently unveiled its new SuperPoD Interconnect technology at the Huawei Connect conference. This groundbreaking infrastructure is designed to dramatically enhance compute power , enabling the company to consolidate its position as a formidable competitor to Nvidia, particularly within China. The SuperPoD technology allows for the interconnection of up to 15,000 graphics cards, including Huawei’s own Ascend AI chips, to function as a unified, massively powerful computing cluster. This development is a direct response to the increasing demand for high-performance computing necessary for training and scaling complex AI systems. While Huawei’s individual AI chips may not match the raw processing power of Nvidia’s top-tier offerings, the ability to link thousands of them together offers a compelling alternative. This strategy is akin to building a supercomputer from numerous smaller, interconnected processors, effectively creating a giant leap in available compute resources. The Impact of the Nvidia China Ban: A New Battlefield Emerges? The timing of Huawei’s announcement is critical, coming just a day after China reportedly banned domestic tech companies from purchasing Nvidia’s advanced hardware. This includes specific Nvidia RTX Pro 600D servers that were tailored for the Chinese market. The Nvidia China Ban represents a significant escalation in the ongoing tech competition between the United States and China, fundamentally altering the landscape for AI development within the region. For Nvidia, this ban means a substantial loss of market share in one of the world’s largest and fastest-growing AI markets. For Chinese tech companies, it necessitates a rapid pivot towards domestic alternatives. This regulatory environment creates an urgent demand for solutions like Huawei’s SuperPoD, which can fill the void left by Nvidia’s restricted access. It’s not just about technological advancement; it’s about strategic self-sufficiency in a fragmented global tech ecosystem. Elevating AI Chips: How Does Huawei Plan to Compete Effectively? The core of Huawei’s competitive strategy lies in its innovative approach to leveraging its existing AI Chips Market presence. By focusing on interconnectivity rather than solely on individual chip performance, Huawei aims to provide scalable and robust solutions for AI development. Here’s how they plan to compete: Massive Scalability: The SuperPoD Interconnect allows for an unprecedented number of chips (up to 15,000) to work in unison, delivering collective compute power that can rival larger, more powerful individual chips. Optimized for Domestic Hardware: This infrastructure is specifically designed to work seamlessly with Huawei’s Ascend AI chips, ensuring optimal performance and integration within a domestically controlled ecosystem. Strategic Independence: By developing its own full-stack AI infrastructure, Huawei reduces reliance on foreign technology, aligning with China’s broader goals of technological sovereignty. This approach highlights a crucial understanding: for many AI applications, sheer raw power from a single chip is less critical than the ability to distribute and manage vast amounts of computation across a network of processors. Huawei’s SuperPoD directly addresses this need, providing a pathway for Chinese enterprises to continue their AI development without interruption from international sanctions. Global Tech Competition: What Does This Mean for the Future of AI? The intensified Tech Competition between global powers, particularly in the realm of AI and semiconductors, has profound implications. Huawei’s latest announcement is a clear signal that China is doubling down on its efforts to build a self-reliant and advanced domestic tech industry. This could lead to: Accelerated Domestic Innovation: The necessity to innovate internally will likely spur faster development cycles and new breakthroughs within China’s tech sector. Diversification of AI Hardware: Developers and businesses worldwide may increasingly consider a broader range of AI hardware solutions, moving beyond a single dominant provider. Fragmented Tech Ecosystems: The global tech landscape might become more segmented, with different regions developing and adopting distinct hardware and software stacks, potentially impacting global interoperability. New Investment Opportunities: As new domestic champions emerge, there will be fresh avenues for investment in AI infrastructure, chip manufacturing, and related software services. For those in the cryptocurrency space, these shifts in AI infrastructure can indirectly influence mining operations, decentralized AI projects, and the overall technological backbone supporting various blockchain innovations. Greater access to diversified compute power could foster new advancements in AI-driven smart contracts, oracle networks, and secure data processing. Conclusion: A New Era for AI Development in China Huawei’s announcement of its new AI infrastructure, the SuperPoD Interconnect, marks a pivotal moment in the global AI Chips Market . In the face of the Nvidia China Ban and escalating Tech Competition , Huawei is demonstrating remarkable resilience and strategic foresight. By focusing on interconnected Huawei AI chips to deliver immense compute power , the company is not just filling a void but actively shaping a new paradigm for AI development within China. This move underscores a broader trend towards technological self-sufficiency and promises to accelerate domestic innovation, with far-reaching implications for the global tech industry and beyond. To learn more about the latest AI market trends, explore our article on key developments shaping AI features. This post Huawei AI Unleashes Strategic Infrastructure Amid Nvidia’s China Lockout first appeared on BitcoinWorld .

title: Egrag Crypto to XRP Holders: We’re Set for Takeoff If This Support Holds
body: A single price level can transform cautious optimism into market conviction. That is the essence of EGRAG Crypto’s latest analysis, which pairs “before and after” TradingView charts with a focused X post. The message is clear: as long as XRP defends a key support zone, the path toward a major upward move remains firmly intact. The Initial Setup: “Before” the Breakout In the first chart, EGRAG illustrates a textbook symmetrical triangle pattern . Price action tightens between converging trendlines while the 21- and 33-period moving averages hug closely underneath, signaling compressed momentum. A side-panel note labels this phase the “triangle retest,” highlighting $3.00 as the critical battleground. According to EGRAG, this level marks the difference between a routine consolidation and the start of a powerful new trend. The emphasis on the interaction between the 21 EMA and 33 EMA underscores how closely moving averages align with the pattern’s structural integrity. #XRP – Ready to Move! As long as #XRP doesn’t close below $3.00 on the daily or 3-day time frame, we’re set for takeoff! A wick on lower time frames to $2.90-$2.95 is still a possibility. **************************NOTE:************************** When you start to… pic.twitter.com/yOvSHTZWIe — EGRAG CRYPTO (@egragcrypto) September 19, 2025 Confirmation: The “After” Perspective The follow-up chart captures what EGRAG calls the “after” view. Here, XRP presses against the triangle’s upper boundary and then retests the breakout line near $3.00, with the 21 EMA and 33 EMA still acting as firm support. EGRAG projects that a successful hold could propel the token toward incremental resistance in the low-$3 range, ultimately leading to a more ambitious $4.20 target derived from the triangle’s measured move. The “retest edge” highlighted in the chart effectively becomes the launchpad for a potential rally. Support and Risk Parameters EGRAG stresses one decisive rule: XRP must not close below $3.00 on the daily or three-day timeframe. Brief intraday wicks dipping to $2.90–$2.95 are acceptable. Still, a sustained close under $3.00 would invalidate the bullish thesis and shift focus to deeper support zones, including levels as low as $2.80 or even $2.00. Traders and investors are therefore urged to treat the $3.00 daily and three-day close as a non-negotiable line of defense when managing risk. We are on X, follow us to connect with us :- @TimesTabloid1 — TimesTabloid (@TimesTabloid1) June 15, 2025 Real-Time Market Context As of report time, XRP is trading in the low-$3 range, keeping the breakout scenario very much alive. Market watchers are advised to monitor daily and three-day closes, the relative position of the 21 and 33 EMAs, and any surge in volume for confirmation. A decisive close above the $3.20–$3.30 corridor would substantially raise the probability of reaching EGRAG’s projected $4.20 objective. Conversely, a clear break below the $3.00 threshold would force a complete reassessment of the market’s upside potential. Bottom Line EGRAG Crypto’s dual-chart presentation frames a straightforward, high-stakes proposition. As long as XRP maintains daily and three-day closes above $3.00, the technical roadmap favors a strong upward move. Hold that line, and the market could be poised for a sharp advance; lose it, and the bullish structure gives way to a far more uncertain outlook. title: Urgent Update: OKX Perpetual Futures Delisting DUCK/USDT Imminent
body: BitcoinWorld Urgent Update: OKX Perpetual Futures Delisting DUCK/USDT Imminent Are you an active trader on OKX? If so, an important announcement regarding the OKX perpetual futures delisting of DUCK/USDT has just been made. This crucial update demands your immediate attention, as it could significantly impact your current trading positions and future strategies. Staying informed about exchange decisions is vital in the fast-paced world of cryptocurrency. This particular delisting highlights the dynamic nature of digital asset trading platforms and the need for traders to remain agile. What’s Happening with DUCK/USDT Perpetual Futures? OKX, a prominent global cryptocurrency exchange, recently confirmed that it will delist the DUCK/USDT perpetual futures contract. This significant event is scheduled to occur at 4:00 p.m. UTC on September 19 . For traders who currently hold open positions in DUCK/USDT perpetual futures, this date marks a critical deadline. The announcement from OKX serves as a clear signal for all affected users to take necessary precautions. The automatic settlement of positions can sometimes lead to unexpected outcomes, making proactive management essential. Why is OKX Implementing This Perpetual Futures Delisting? Exchange delistings, such as this OKX perpetual futures delisting , are a common occurrence in the cryptocurrency market. They typically stem from a variety of factors aimed at maintaining a healthy and efficient trading environment. While OKX did not provide specific reasons for the DUCK/USDT delisting in its announcement, common causes include: Low Liquidity: A lack of sufficient trading volume or depth in the order book can make a trading pair difficult to manage and prone to price manipulation. Insufficient Demand: If a cryptocurrency project or its associated trading pair loses market interest, exchanges may remove it to optimize resources. Project Performance Concerns: Issues with the underlying project, such as development stagnation, security vulnerabilities, or a failure to meet roadmap goals, can lead to delisting. Regulatory Changes: Evolving regulatory landscapes can sometimes force exchanges to re-evaluate their listed assets. These actions are often taken to protect traders from illiquid markets and ensure the overall integrity of the platform. Crucial Steps for Traders: How to Protect Your Positions If you have active positions in DUCK/USDT perpetual futures on OKX, immediate action is paramount. Here are the key steps you should consider taking: Close Positions Manually: It is strongly advised to close all your open DUCK/USDT perpetual futures positions before the 4:00 p.m. UTC deadline on September 19. This allows you to control your exit price and avoid the automatic settlement process, which might occur at an unfavorable rate. Monitor Your Account: Regularly check your OKX account for any remaining DUCK/USDT balances or related assets. Stay Updated: Keep a close watch on official OKX announcements for any further details or clarifications regarding the OKX perpetual futures delisting . Taking these proactive measures can help you mitigate potential losses and manage your portfolio effectively during this transition. Ignoring the deadline could lead to unforeseen consequences for your capital. Navigating the Future: What This Means for Your Trading Strategy The OKX perpetual futures delisting of DUCK/USDT serves as a stark reminder of the inherent risks and rapid changes within the crypto market. While such events can be unsettling, they also underscore the importance of adaptability and continuous learning for traders. Consider using this as an opportunity to: Diversify Your Portfolio: Avoid over-reliance on a single asset or trading pair. Explore Other Opportunities: OKX offers a wide range of other perpetual futures contracts and spot trading pairs. Research and identify new opportunities that align with your risk tolerance. Enhance Risk Management: Review and refine your risk management strategies, especially when dealing with highly leveraged products like perpetual futures. Remaining informed about market news, exchange policies, and project developments is crucial for long-term success in cryptocurrency trading. This event encourages traders to reassess and strengthen their approach to market volatility. Summary: Be Prepared for Market Changes The upcoming OKX perpetual futures delisting of DUCK/USDT on September 19 is a significant development for affected traders. Proactive management of your positions before the deadline is essential to ensure a smooth transition and minimize potential impacts on your portfolio. The dynamic nature of crypto markets means that staying informed, adaptable, and having robust risk management strategies are more important than ever. Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs) Q1: What exactly is being delisted by OKX? A1: OKX is delisting the DUCK/USDT perpetual futures contract. This means you will no longer be able to trade this specific derivative product on their platform after the specified date. Q2: When is the OKX perpetual futures delisting happening? A2: The delisting is scheduled for 4:00 p.m. UTC on September 19. It is crucial to manage your positions before this time. Q3: What should I do if I have open DUCK/USDT perpetual futures positions? A3: You should close your positions manually before the delisting deadline. This allows you to control the settlement price and avoid automatic liquidation by the exchange. Q4: Why do exchanges delist perpetual futures contracts? A4: Exchanges typically delist contracts due to factors like low liquidity, insufficient trading volume, concerns about the underlying project’s performance, or to comply with regulatory changes. Q5: Will my DUCK tokens in my spot wallet also be affected by this delisting? A5: This delisting specifically pertains to the DUCK/USDT perpetual futures contract. It does not directly affect spot trading of DUCK tokens, but it is always wise to check OKX’s official announcements for any related changes to spot markets. Q6: Where can I find official information about this delisting? A6: Always refer to the official OKX announcement channels, such as their website news section or official social media, for the most accurate and up-to-date information. If you found this article helpful, please share it with your fellow traders and on social media to ensure everyone is aware of this important update! To learn more about the latest crypto market trends, explore our article on key developments shaping Bitcoin price action. title: The First US $XRP ETF Gets $24M Volume in 90 Minutes – Which Are the Best Altcoins to Buy Now?
body: The first US spot $XRP ETF just made its debut, and $XRP investors can’t keep calm. Within 90 minutes, the fund racked up $24M in trading volume. The explosive debut has sparked hopes of a broader market rally. And as Uptober sentiment starts spreading across the market, investors are on the hunt for the best altcoins to buy now. REX-Osprey ETF Sparks Optimism REX Shares and Osprey Funds has launched the REX-Osprey $XRP ETF , the first US-based ETF tied to $XRP. The ETF offers exposure to $XRP via a Cayman Islands subsidiary. $XRP, being the third-largest crypto and backed by a cross-border payment ecosystem, has long tempted traditional investors. But many fear taking the first step. The new ETF, however, opens the door for traditional investors to access $XRP without the hassle of installing a crypto wallet or managing private keys. The fund’s strong debut surprised both investors and analysts. For example, Bloomberg Senior ETF Analyst Eric Balchunas describes the $24M figure as a ‘semi-shock,’ as its performance is five times stronger than $XRP futures ETFs managed on their first day. It has also sparked bullish sentiments in the crypto community, as the launch could bring more institutional capital to the $XRP ecosystem. In fact, 58% of Myriad users expect the $XRP price to hit a new all-time high of $4 . As Uptober approaches, which altcoins could follow a similar trend and moon? Here are what we’ve identified as the best altcoins to buy now. 1. Bitcoin Hyper ($HYPER) – Building A Long-Awaited Bitcoin Layer-2 Bitcoin Hyper ($HYPER) is one of the hottest new cryptos this season. Like $XRP, Bitcoin Hyper is an infrastructure coin with high utility – it’s building a Bitcoin Layer-2 ecosystem. Bitcoin is a brilliant store of value, as its exponential surge over the years proves. But the blockchain has failed to stay up-to-date with the times. Bitcoin’s slow max theoretical transactions per second (TPS) rate of just seven pales in comparison to Solana’s 65K . High transaction costs and lack of scalability are also among Bitcoin’s pain points. That’s why Hyper is introducing a Layer-2 designed to give Bitcoin more speed, efficiency, and scalability – while lowering transaction fees. It will bring this vision alive by integrating advanced tools, such as a non-custodial Canonical Bridge and the Solana Virtual Machine (SVM). You send your $BTC to a designated wallet where it will be verified and then minted on the Layer-2 as wrapped $BTC, unlocking access to DeFi, dApps, NFTs, and gaming. The SVM, meanwhile, builds a programmable layer on top of the base Bitcoin blockchain. It also makes transactions faster and cheaper, while maintaining Bitcoin-level security. That explains why both retail and whale investors are hurrying to secure the token for low prices before it hits exchanges. The viral $HYPER presale is closing in on the $17M milestone, as whales circle the project. Bitcoin Hyper has recorded $418K whale buys in September alone, across 24 large transactions. August, meanwhile, saw a particularly impressive individual whale buy of $161.3K . Right now you can buy $HYPER for $0.012945, and stake it for 68% APY. Our How To Buy Bitcoin Hyper guide explains how to do just that. By the way, our Bitcoin Hyper price prediction suggests that $HYPER could deliver up to 25x gains from its presale price by the end of the year. Join the $HYPER presale before the next price increase. 2. PEPENODE ($PEPENODE) – The First-Ever Mine-To-Earn Meme Coin The crypto market runs on tech and innovation, and projects $XRP and $HYPER showcase this trend. But the crypto culture welcomes fun and chaos too, as the exponential growth of the meme coin niche shows. In fact, REX-Osprey just launched the $DOJE ETF, the first US Dogecoin ETF. Yet $DOGE is a market giant with limited room for growth. That’s why Pepenode ($PEPENODE) , the world’s first mine-to-earn meme coin, has become an instant sensation among degens. In its viral new presale, the project has already raised $1.2M. So, what’s driving this FOMO? Speculation is sometimes not enough to drive token demand. $PEPENODE understands this.That’s why it has launched a gamified meme coin model that keeps investors coming back for more. Holding $PEPENODE lets you buy virtual miner nodes and facilities, build server rooms, boost hashpower, and collect $PEPENODE rewards – right from the get-go. No need to wait until the token generation event. The fun kicks in immediately. The interactive mine-to-earn system is also completely virtual, doing away with hardware and large investments. Pepenode offers other mechanisms to boost your earning potential: Receive 2% of mined rewards from users you refer Passive staking offers attractive passive income (currently at an impressive 1,019% APY) on staked tokens The platform will also burn 70% of the tokens spent on upgrades, driving the token price up over time as they become more scarce $PEPENODE is currently priced at $0.001066, but the next hike is just two days away. Check out our How To Buy Pepenode guide to find out everything you need to know. Then visit the Pepenode website today to buy and stake your tokens. 3. Ethereum ($ETH) – The OG Set To Rock Altcoin Season For investors who are more comfortable with blue-chip cryptos, Ethereum ($ETH) is an obvious choice this season. $ETH has climbed around 7.25% in the past four weeks, as the market welcomes altcoin season. The recent Fed rate cut is widely expected to boost risk appetite across financial markets, and crypto could be one of the biggest winners. Among the best crypto to buy now, giants like $ETH and $XRP, in particular, stand to benefit the most. Since Ethereum ETFs are already available, traditional investors can gain exposure to the coin without directly interacting with the crypto market. Yet frictionless access is not the only reason drawing traditional investors to Ethereum. Ethereum’s smart contract ecosystem powers everything from DeFi, NFTs, and meme coins to gaming, fueling its long-term growth. While Bitcoin tops crypto rankings, tapping into its historical relevance, the market owes its technological growth to projects like Ethereum. Ethereum’s Fusaka upgrade is set to go live in November, just ahead of Devconnect, bringing 11 Ethereum Improvement Proposals focused on backend infrastructure. In other words, September could be a strategic time to buy $ETH, as it prepares for a series of rallies. Buy your $ETH today via Binance and other leading platforms. Being a large-cap crypto with a massive market cap of around $545B, is it unrealistic to expect exponential returns from $ETH? Perhaps. But this is where small-cap cryptos like $HYPER and $PEPENODE shine, placing them alongside $ETH as the best altcoins to buy now. Be sure to always do your own research before investing. This is not financial advice. Authored by Bogdan Patru, Bitcoinist – https://bitcoinist.com/best-altcoins-to-buy-as-us-xrp-etf-gets-24m-volume

title: Kevin Durant odzyskał Bitcoiny z Coinbase warte fortunę
body: Kevin Durant, jedna z największych aktywnych gwiazd NBA. Zawodnik Houston Rockets, ponownie znalazł się w nagłówkach gazet. Tym razem nie chodzi jednak o sportowe sukcesy lub transferowe plotki. Po latach Kevin Durant odzyskał Bitcoiny! KD na nowo ma dostęp do swojego dawno zapomnianego konta na Coinbase, gdzie trzymał Bitcoiny kupione niemal dekadę temu. Wartość tych aktywów wzrosła blisko 200-krotnie ! Powrót do dawno kupionych Bitcoinów Durant i jego agent, Rich Kleiman, po raz pierwszy zetknęli się z Bitcoinem w 2016 roku. Inspiracją była nietypowa okazja – urodzinowa impreza organizowana przez inwestora Bena Horowitza. Jak wspominał Kleiman podczas konferencji CNBC Game Plan w Los Angeles: Po prostu słyszałem słowo “Bitcoin” 25 razy tego wieczoru, a następnego dnia zaczęliśmy inwestować w Bitcoina. W ówczas cena jednej monety oscylowała wokół 600 dolarów. Dziś to już blisko 117 tysięcy dolarów , co oznacza niemal 200-krotny wzrost wartości. Problemem przez lata były jednak utracone dane logowania. Durant nie miał dostępu do środków, a portfel na Coinbase pozostawał zamrożony. Teraz, dzięki pomocy zespołu wsparcia Coinbase i narzędzi do resetowania, sprawa została rozwiązana. Brian Armstrong, CEO Coinbase, potwierdził sukces całej operacji w poście na platformie X. We got this fixed. Account recovery complete! https://t.co/TWYFpQkXsb — Brian Armstrong (@brian_armstrong) September 19, 2025 Durant – inwestor, sportowiec i partner Coinbase To nie pierwszy raz, gdy Durant pojawia się w kontekście Coinbase. Razem z Kleimanem inwestował w tę giełdę już w 2017 roku poprzez firmę venture capital Thirty Five Ventures. Od 2021 roku pełnił też funkcję ambasadora marki. Jego relacja ze światem kryptowalut rozwijała się równolegle z karierą koszykarską, Durant wpisuje się w trend sportowców sięgających po kryptowaluty. Tristan Thompson niedawno uruchomił własny projekt Web3, a Spencer Dinwiddie próbował nawet tokenizować swój kontrakt NBA. To dowód, że sektor sportu i blockchainu zacieśnia więzi szybciej, niż wielu mogło się spodziewać. Nowe pokolenie projektów Historia Duranta to przypomnienie, że wczesna decyzja inwestycyjna w Bitcoin mogła zmienić przyszłość finansową każdego, kto wykazał się cierpliwością. Ale dziś, obok klasycznego Bitcoina, na rynku pojawiają się projekty rozwijające jego potencjał. Jednym z nich jest Bitcoin Hyper. Bitcoin Hyper to innowacyjna warstwa druga, która łączy moc sieci Bitcoin z funkcjonalnościami znanymi z DeFi . Twórcy wykorzystali Solana Virtual Machine, aby transakcje były błyskawiczne i tanie, a jednocześnie dodali mechanizmy stakingu i obsługi aplikacji zdecentralizowanych. Rdzeniem systemu jest token $HYPER , zgodny ze standardami ERC-20 i BEP-20. Użytkownicy mogą nim zarządzać przez popularne portfele, takie jak MetaMask, Trust Wallet czy Best Wallet . Most między Bitcoinem a DeFi Unikalnym elementem Bitcoin Hyper jest tzw. Bitcoin Relay. Dzięki niemu użytkownik może przenieść swoje BTC do warstwy drugiej i otrzymać token reprezentacyjny. Ten token działa w ekosystemie Hyper i otwiera dostęp do nowoczesnych usług finansowych od yield farmingu, przez pożyczki, aż po zdecentralizowane giełdy. Co ważne, wypłata środków odbywa się bez pośredników. System synchronizuje transakcje z głównym łańcuchem Bitcoina i zabezpiecza je za pomocą technologii zero-knowledge proofs. To rozwiązanie zwiększa prywatność i skalowalność całej sieci. Dzięki temu Bitcoin Hyper buduje pomost między najbardziej rozpoznawalną kryptowalutą świata a nową generacją narzędzi finansowych. Można powiedzieć, że gdy Durant zyskał na swojej pasywnej inwestycji w BTC, nowe projekty takie jak $HYPER pozwalają aktywnie wykorzystywać ten kapitał. Staking bez blokady Wielu inwestorów odstraszają skomplikowane mechanizmy stakingu, które wymagają blokady środków na określony czas. Bitcoin Hyper eliminuje tę barierę. Nagrody naliczane są automatycznie od momentu zakupu tokena . Środki można wypłacić w dowolnym momencie, co daje większą elastyczność i swobodę. To rozwiązanie szczególnie przemawia do osób, które dopiero rozpoczynają przygodę z kryptowalutami. Podobnie jak Durant w 2016 roku, nie trzeba być ekspertem, aby skorzystać z potencjału nowej technologii. Bezpieczeństwo i przejrzystość Każdy projekt nowych najlepszych memecoinów musi mierzyć się z pytaniem o bezpieczeństwo. W przypadku Bitcoin Hyper audyt przeprowadziła firma Coinsult. Analiza kodu nie wykazała żadnych luk ani mechanizmów umożliwiających manipulację podażą. To podejście kontrastuje z wieloma memecoinami, które opierają się głównie na marketingu. Hyper łączy innowacyjną technologię z zasadami otwartego rynku, co może zainteresować inwestorów szukających bardziej zrównoważonych projektów. Ekosystem i przyszłość Whitepaper Bitcoin Hyper dzieli rozwój na trzy etapy. Pierwszy to uruchomienie warstwy 2 i stakingu. Kolejny to wdrożenie. Ostatni etap to ozszerzenie interoperacyjności na inne łańcuchy, takie jak Polygon czy Arbitrum. Część funkcji jest już aktywna. Działa most BTC, staking i podstawowe aplikacje DeFi. Projekt ma ambicje stać się integralną częścią Web3, łącząc społeczności różnych sieci blockchain. Dzięki kompatybilności z ERC-20 i BEP-20, $HYPER już teraz integruje się z dziesiątkami narzędzi dostępnych na rynku. Nowy rozdział w relacji sportu i blockchaina Historia Kevina Duranta to przykład, jak technologia zmienia życie nie tylko inwestorów, ale też osób spoza świata finansów . Niegdyś przypadkowa rozmowa na urodzinach doprowadziła go do inwestycji, która dziś jest warta fortunę. Odzyskanie dostępu do konta Coinbase przypomina, że cierpliwość i otwartość na nowe rozwiązania mogą przynieść nieoczekiwane efekty. Jednocześnie pojawienie się projektów takich jak Bitcoin Hyper dowodzi, że rynek kryptowalut nie stoi w miejscu. Z jednej strony mamy klasyczny Bitcoin – symbol stabilności i cyfrowego złota. Z drugiej – innowacyjne sieci warstwy drugiej, które oferują błyskawiczne transakcje, staking i integrację z DeFi. To właśnie w takich przestrzeniach mogą pojawić się kolejne okazje inwestycyjne, które przyciągną zarówno profesjonalistów, jak i nowych użytkowników poszukujących najlepszego krypto do inwestycji .

title: Ethereum Holdings: FG Nexus’s Bold Move Towards Crypto Dominance
body: BitcoinWorld Ethereum Holdings: FG Nexus’s Bold Move Towards Crypto Dominance In the dynamic world of digital finance, a significant development has captured the attention of investors and market watchers alike. Nasdaq-listed company FG Nexus (FGNX) recently announced a substantial increase in its Ethereum holdings , pushing its total to an impressive 49,715 ETH. This strategic accumulation, valued at approximately $229 million, underscores a clear ambition: to become the leading corporate holder of Ethereum. What’s Driving FG Nexus’s Impressive Ethereum Holdings Growth? FG Nexus has been methodically expanding its digital asset portfolio. The latest surge in their Ethereum holdings comes from two primary sources, showcasing a well-rounded approach to asset growth: Staking Rewards: A portion of the increase is attributed to rewards earned from staking their existing Ethereum. Staking is a process where participants lock up their cryptocurrency to support the network’s operations, in return for new coin rewards. Additional Purchase: The company also made a direct purchase of 1,087 ETH, further solidifying its position. This direct acquisition highlights a proactive investment strategy. This calculated expansion is not merely about holding assets; it is about positioning FG Nexus as a major player in the institutional adoption of cryptocurrencies. Their stated goal of becoming the largest corporate holder of Ethereum signals a strong belief in the asset’s long-term value and utility. Why Are More Companies Building Significant Ethereum Holdings? The trend of corporations accumulating cryptocurrencies, particularly Ethereum, is gaining momentum. Companies are increasingly recognizing the potential of digital assets beyond just speculative trading. Here are a few reasons why firms like FG Nexus are boosting their Ethereum holdings : Diversification: Adding digital assets can diversify a company’s treasury holdings, potentially offering a hedge against traditional market fluctuations. Growth Potential: Ethereum, as the backbone of decentralized finance (DeFi), NFTs, and countless decentralized applications, offers substantial growth potential. Its robust ecosystem makes it an attractive long-term investment. Technological Alignment: For tech-focused companies, holding Ethereum can align with their innovative ethos and provide direct exposure to the evolving Web3 landscape. Strategic Positioning: Being an early and significant holder can offer a competitive advantage as the digital economy matures. Furthermore, the increasing institutional infrastructure supporting crypto investments makes it easier and more secure for public companies to manage their digital assets. What Does This Significant Increase in Ethereum Holdings Mean for the Broader Market? FG Nexus’s bold move carries implications for the wider cryptocurrency market. A major Nasdaq-listed entity publicly increasing its Ethereum holdings can: Boost Confidence: It sends a strong signal of institutional confidence in Ethereum’s stability and future prospects, potentially encouraging other corporations to consider similar strategies. Validate Ethereum’s Utility: Such a significant investment from a traditional finance player further validates Ethereum’s role as a foundational technology, not just a speculative asset. Influence Market Dynamics: Large corporate holdings can reduce the circulating supply of ETH, which could, over time, impact its market dynamics. While the benefits are clear, challenges such as market volatility and evolving regulatory landscapes remain important considerations for any corporate entity venturing into significant digital asset investments. However, FG Nexus appears committed to navigating these complexities. FG Nexus’s ambition to become the largest corporate holder of Ethereum is a testament to the growing acceptance and integration of digital assets into mainstream finance. Their strategy, combining staking rewards with direct purchases, offers a blueprint for other companies looking to build substantial Ethereum holdings . This development not only highlights FG Nexus’s forward-thinking approach but also underscores the increasing institutional validation of Ethereum as a crucial digital asset for the future. Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs) What is FG Nexus (FGNX)? FG Nexus (FGNX) is a Nasdaq-listed company that has publicly disclosed its strategic investments in digital assets, particularly Ethereum, aiming to become a significant player in the crypto space. How much Ethereum (ETH) does FG Nexus currently hold? FG Nexus has increased its Ethereum holdings to a total of 49,715 ETH, which was valued at approximately $229 million at the time of their announcement. How did FG Nexus acquire its additional Ethereum? The company acquired its additional Ethereum through a combination of staking rewards from its existing ETH holdings and a direct purchase of 1,087 ETH. What is the significance of a Nasdaq-listed company increasing its Ethereum holdings? This move signifies growing institutional confidence in Ethereum as a valuable long-term asset, potentially encouraging other traditional companies to explore similar investment strategies and further legitimizing digital assets in mainstream finance. What is FG Nexus’s long-term goal regarding Ethereum? FG Nexus has stated its ambitious goal to become the largest corporate holder of Ethereum, indicating a strong belief in its future utility and value. Did you find this article insightful? Share it with your network and join the conversation about the future of corporate crypto adoption! To learn more about the latest crypto market trends, explore our article on key developments shaping Ethereum institutional adoption. This post Ethereum Holdings: FG Nexus’s Bold Move Towards Crypto Dominance first appeared on BitcoinWorld .

title: Binance Settlement Faces Urgent Scrutiny from US Lawmakers
body: BitcoinWorld Binance Settlement Faces Urgent Scrutiny from US Lawmakers The ongoing Binance settlement saga has taken a dramatic turn, drawing intense scrutiny from Capitol Hill. A powerful group of U.S. lawmakers is urgently demanding more clarity and information from the Department of Justice (DOJ) regarding a pending agreement. This agreement seeks to lift critical compliance monitoring obligations for Binance, the world’s largest cryptocurrency exchange. The move has sparked considerable debate and concern among industry observers and regulators alike. Why Are Lawmakers Questioning the Binance Settlement? In a strongly worded letter addressed to the DOJ, several prominent lawmakers, including the outspoken crypto industry critic Senator Elizabeth Warren, have voiced serious reservations. Their primary concern revolves around the department’s alleged failure to adequately verify Binance’s claims. These claims assert that the exchange has fully paid its substantial Binance settlement fine and is now in complete compliance with all mandated requirements. This lack of verification, they argue, leaves too many unanswered questions. Lawmakers doubt proper verification of Binance’s compliance. Concerns over the payment of the Binance settlement fine. Demands for concrete evidence of adherence to all regulatory obligations. Moreover, the timing of the DOJ’s potential action to ease compliance monitoring has fueled further suspicion. This decision comes amidst growing public awareness of Binance’s developing financial relationships with World Liberty Financial (WLFI), a decentralized finance (DeFi) project reportedly linked to the Trump family. This connection has raised eyebrows and intensified calls for transparency. The Unanswered Questions: Trump Family Ties and the Binance Settlement The lawmakers’ letter highlights a critical point: they had previously submitted detailed questions about Binance to the DOJ back in May. Disappointingly, they claim to have received no adequate response to those inquiries. Now, with the new developments surrounding WLFI, they have escalated their demands, requesting a comprehensive and updated answer by October 1. This deadline underscores the urgency of their concerns regarding the Binance settlement . Previous inquiries in May went unanswered by the DOJ. A new, firm deadline of October 1 has been set for a comprehensive response. Lawmakers are focusing on the potential influence of external financial ties on the DOJ’s decisions. The alleged financial ties between Binance and WLFI, a project associated with the Trump family, introduce a complex layer to the ongoing Binance settlement discussions. Critics suggest that such connections could potentially influence the DOJ’s decisions regarding Binance’s monitoring obligations, raising questions about fairness and impartiality in regulatory oversight. This situation adds significant weight to the lawmakers’ demand for full disclosure. What Are the Implications of This Scrutiny for the Binance Settlement? This intensified scrutiny has broad implications for Binance, the cryptocurrency industry, and the integrity of regulatory processes. For Binance, a failure to convincingly demonstrate full compliance could prolong its period of enhanced oversight and potentially lead to further punitive actions. The exchange’s reputation, already impacted by its past legal troubles, is once again at stake. For the broader crypto market, this situation could trigger: Increased calls for stricter oversight of large exchanges globally. Potential for new legislative measures designed to prevent conflicts of interest in crypto dealings. A push for greater transparency in all cryptocurrency-related financial dealings and partnerships. Furthermore, the situation puts the Department of Justice under immense pressure to uphold its commitment to impartial enforcement. The public and lawmakers expect a thorough and unbiased investigation into the compliance status of the Binance settlement , irrespective of any external political or financial connections. This incident serves as a crucial test of the DOJ’s accountability and independence. The unfolding narrative around the Binance settlement and its alleged connections to politically influential families highlights the intricate challenges facing the cryptocurrency space. As US lawmakers push for answers, the demand for transparency, rigorous compliance, and impartial regulatory oversight has never been more critical. The outcome of this inquiry will undoubtedly set important precedents for future cryptocurrency regulation and reinforce the necessity of unwavering integrity in the digital asset landscape. The world watches as the DOJ faces its deadline. Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs) Q1: What is the main concern of US lawmakers regarding the Binance settlement? A: Lawmakers are primarily concerned that the Department of Justice has not adequately verified Binance’s claims of full compliance and payment of its settlement fine, questioning the transparency and impartiality of the process. Q2: Who are the key lawmakers involved in questioning the DOJ? A: The group includes prominent figures such as Senator Elizabeth Warren, a well-known critic of the cryptocurrency industry. Q3: What is World Liberty Financial (WLFI) and its alleged connection? A: World Liberty Financial (WLFI) is a DeFi project that lawmakers allege has financial ties with Binance and is reportedly linked to the Trump family, raising suspicions about potential influence. Q4: Why is the timing of the DOJ’s action suspicious to lawmakers? A: Lawmakers find the timing suspicious because the DOJ’s potential move to lift compliance monitoring obligations for Binance coincides with Binance’s developing financial ties to WLFI, a project with political connections. Q5: What is the deadline for the DOJ to respond to the lawmakers’ demands? A: The lawmakers have requested an updated and comprehensive answer from the DOJ by October 1. Q6: What are the potential implications of this scrutiny for Binance? A: This scrutiny could prolong Binance’s enhanced oversight, potentially lead to further punitive actions, and impact its reputation, while also setting precedents for future cryptocurrency regulation and demanding greater transparency across the industry. Did this article shed light on the complex interplay between cryptocurrency regulation and political influence?
