title: Ethereum Devs Announce Fusaka Release Schedule With Mainnet Launch in December
body: Ethereum developers have confirmed the rollout schedule for the Fusaka upgrade during the ACDC 165 call. It will launch on the Holesky testnet on October 1, followed by Sepolia on October 14, Hoodi on October 28, and the mainnet on December 3. Details of the Launch Christine Kim, former Vice President of Research at Galaxy Digital, shared these details on X, noting that developers will reconfirm the exact dates, epoch numbers, and timings over the next few days. Ethereum’s upcoming Fusaka release marks the next major protocol upgrade following Pectra. It introduces 11 proposals designed to improve scalability, node stability, and validator performance. Key changes include PeerDAS, which helps with data availability sampling and controlling spam, as well as an increase in blob capacity and a higher gas limit of 150 million units. These updates are expected to lower Layer 2 (L2) rollup costs and increase transaction throughput, while also laying the groundwork for future improvements such as faster block times and Verkle tree integration. Preliminary analysis on Devnet-5 has shown that blob capacity should more than double over the two weeks following its activation. Developers also shared the BPO hard fork plan for Fusaka, with Kim explaining that it will initially launch without changes to blob capacity. After the first week, the fork will raise the blob target and maximum from 6/9 to 10/15, followed by a second update a week later that increases the values to 14/21. Fusaka to Boost Scalability and Cut L2 Costs If all goes as planned, the release will arrive just seven months after the Pectra upgrade, which introduced wallet enhancements and raised the validator limit to support more efficient staking. Before this, Dencun went live in March 2024, enabling blob transactions and boosting Layer-2 scalability. These developments have made Ethereum faster, cheaper, and more scalable. Following Dencun’s launch, L2 rollups saw data availability costs drop by 90%, with some protocols cutting monthly expenses from $15,000 to $1,500 by switching to blob transactions. This shift also reduced transaction fees by up to 73% while Pectra raised the validator limit from 32 ETH to 2,048 ETH. Fusaka now builds on these foundations as part of the network’s “Surge” phase, targeting throughput and resilience through expanded blob capacity, validator optimizations, and PeerDAS integration. Elsewhere, developer Davide Crapis announced that the Ethereum Foundation is forming a new artificial intelligence unit called the dAI Team. Its main priorities include enabling AI agents and robots to handle payments, coordination, and governance independently. The team will also work on building open and verifiable systems that resist censorship and limit control by centralized players. The post Ethereum Devs Announce Fusaka Release Schedule With Mainnet Launch in December appeared first on CryptoPotato .

title: Russia Sanctions Crypto: Urgent Warnings on Platform Impact from EU President
body: BitcoinWorld Russia Sanctions Crypto: Urgent Warnings on Platform Impact from EU President The world of digital finance is facing an unprecedented challenge. European Commission President Ursula von der Leyen recently issued a significant warning: Russia sanctions crypto platforms will feel a direct impact. This declaration signals a new era where geopolitical tensions directly intersect with the burgeoning cryptocurrency ecosystem, prompting crucial questions about compliance, security, and the future of decentralized finance. It’s a development that every participant in the crypto space, from individual traders to large exchanges, needs to understand. Understanding the Direct Impact of Russia Sanctions Crypto Platforms When the EU Commission President speaks about the effects of sanctions, it’s a clear and powerful signal for the entire crypto industry. The primary goal of these international sanctions is to restrict Russia’s access to global financial systems and resources. Now, this critical net is explicitly extending to digital assets, making it harder for sanctioned entities to bypass traditional banking restrictions. What specific impacts are we talking about? Increased Scrutiny: Cryptocurrency exchanges and service providers are now under heightened pressure to comply with international sanctions. Regulators expect them to actively prevent any circumvention attempts. Enhanced Regulatory Compliance: Platforms must significantly strengthen their Know Your Customer (KYC) and Anti-Money Laundering (AML) procedures. This rigorous approach is vital to identify and prevent sanctioned individuals or entities from using cryptocurrencies to bypass traditional financial restrictions. Potential Asset Freezing: There is a growing potential for digital assets linked to sanctioned parties to be frozen or seized. This action would mirror the measures already taken in the traditional banking sector against specific individuals and organizations. This strategic move highlights a growing global effort to regulate the crypto space, especially in times of international conflict. It underscores that while cryptocurrencies offer the promise of decentralization, they are not entirely immune to governmental oversight and legal frameworks. Navigating the Challenges: How Will Russia Sanctions Crypto Users? The ripple effects of these sanctions extend beyond just the platforms themselves. Individual users, especially those interacting with centralized exchanges, will likely experience significant changes and new requirements. So, what does this mean for the average crypto holder and those active in the DeFi space? More Rigorous Verification: Users might face more stringent identity checks and transaction monitoring processes on centralized exchanges. This is a direct consequence of platforms needing to prove their compliance. Access Restrictions: Individuals or entities identified as being in sanctioned regions or linked to sanctioned activities could find their access to certain crypto services restricted or even entirely blocked. This impacts both sending and receiving funds. Decentralized Dilemma: While decentralized finance (DeFi) platforms are designed to be permissionless, the pressure on front-end interfaces, developers, and even stablecoin issuers to comply could still create access barriers for some users. The debate over true decentralization versus regulatory demands intensifies. The core challenge lies in balancing the innovative, decentralized nature of cryptocurrencies with the imperative of national security and international law. This tension is becoming increasingly evident as regulators worldwide grapple with effective digital asset oversight. Actionable Insights for Russia Sanctions Crypto Compliance and Security For both platforms and individual users, proactive measures are absolutely essential to navigate this evolving and complex regulatory landscape. Staying ahead of changes is key to minimizing risks. How can you ensure compliance and safeguard your digital assets? Stay Critically Informed: Regularly monitor official announcements from key regulatory bodies like the EU Commission, the U.S. Treasury, and national financial authorities. Information is your best defense. Understand Your Platform’s Policies: Familiarize yourself with the compliance policies of the exchanges and services you use. Understand their stance on international sanctions and how they implement them. Practice Due Diligence: For platforms, this means implementing robust screening tools and ongoing transaction monitoring. For users, it means being acutely aware of the origin and destination of your crypto transactions and avoiding any interaction with known sanctioned entities. Seek Expert Legal Counsel: Businesses operating in the crypto space, particularly those with international reach, should seek expert legal advice. This ensures full compliance with complex and constantly changing international sanction regimes. The overarching goal is to maintain the integrity of the global financial system while allowing legitimate innovation in the digital asset space to flourish. This requires careful consideration, responsible practices, and a commitment to transparency from all participants. Conclusion: The statement from European Commission President Ursula von der Leyen regarding the impact of Russia sanctions crypto platforms is a pivotal moment for the cryptocurrency industry. It underscores the urgent need for robust compliance, transparent operations, and a clear understanding of evolving regulatory expectations. As the digital asset landscape continues to mature, its intersection with global geopolitics will only become more pronounced, demanding vigilance and adaptability from all participants. This is a critical juncture for the future of crypto, shaping how digital assets will be perceived and regulated on the world stage. Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs) Q1: What exactly are the EU sanctions against Russia targeting in the crypto space? A1: The EU sanctions aim to prevent Russia and sanctioned entities from using cryptocurrencies to bypass traditional financial restrictions. This means platforms must implement stricter KYC/AML checks and potentially freeze assets linked to sanctioned parties. Q2: Will these sanctions affect all cryptocurrency platforms equally? A2: Centralized exchanges and regulated service providers are most directly affected due to their legal obligations. Decentralized platforms face different challenges, but pressure on their front-ends and associated services can still impact users. Q3: What should individual crypto users do to comply with these sanctions? A3: Individual users should stay informed about regulatory changes, understand their chosen platform’s compliance policies, and ensure they are not inadvertently interacting with sanctioned entities. More rigorous identity verification might be required. Q4: Is there a risk of my crypto assets being frozen due to these sanctions? A4: If your assets are held on a centralized exchange and are linked to a sanctioned individual, entity, or region, there is a risk of them being frozen to comply with international law. Always ensure your transactions are legitimate and compliant. Q5: How does this impact the broader vision of decentralized finance (DeFi)? A5: This development highlights the ongoing tension between true decentralization and regulatory demands. While DeFi aims to be permissionless, the need for compliance can lead to challenges for front-end access, stablecoin issuers, and other components of the DeFi ecosystem. Found this article insightful? Share it with your network to help others understand the crucial impact of Russia sanctions on crypto platforms. Your awareness and sharing contribute to a more informed and compliant crypto community! To learn more about the latest explore our article on key developments shaping crypto market institutional adoption . This post Russia Sanctions Crypto: Urgent Warnings on Platform Impact from EU President first appeared on BitcoinWorld .

title: XRP Targets $15 as ETF Buzz and Bullish Charts Align
body: TL;DR XRP formed a double bottom near $3 and now tests support after a strong breakout. REX-Osprey XRP ETF opens with $37.7M volume, marking the biggest ETF debut in 2025. High-volume liquidity between $3–$3.05 supports the price; resistance is expected near the $3.3–$3.5 zone. Technical Setup Points to Breakout Potential XRP is trading near $3.05, showing a weekly gain of just under 2%. The chart shows a bull flag pattern on the weekly timeframe, which typically appears after a sharp upward move. This setup has traders watching a possible short-term target around $5.8, based on the flagpole projection. Looking back further, XRP broke out of a larger consolidation channel that had been in place since early 2024. That broader move gives a longer-term target close to $15. Momentum, as measured by RSI, sits just below 60—an area that reflects strength without entering overbought conditions. Source: Zenia/X Notably, the REX-Osprey XRP ETF, listed on Cboe under the ticker XRPR, posted $37.7 million in trading volume on its opening day. That made it the most actively traded ETF debut of the year. Data shared by Eric Balchunas of Bloomberg confirmed it outpaced the previous record set by the Wedbush AI Revolution ETF (IVES). Market analyst Zenia noted that XRP’s price setup is now backed by structural developments. She said new partnerships with DBS and Franklin Templeton add further weight. Referring to past cycles, she wrote, “Will the ETF era finally give XRP the sustained breakout that past cycles failed to hold?” Pullback to Key Support Zone Short-term price action shows XRP recently formed a double bottom near $3, which triggered a move to around $3.13. The price is now testing $3.08, a zone acting as short-term support. According to market watcher BitGuru, “Holding this zone could set the stage for another upward push, while losing it may invite more consolidation.” So far, the price structure remains stable. If buyers defend this level, the next test could be toward the recent high. If not, the market may look back toward the $3 area as the next support. Source: BitGuru/X Liquidity Map Highlights Key Levels Volume data on the 1-hour chart shows strong activity between $3 and $3.05, marking this as an area of high liquidity. This level has supported multiple tests and is now viewed as a zone of active trading interest. Analysis shared by Cryptoinsightuk shows that above this range, resistance could build near $3.3–$3.5, where larger order clusters are visible. $XRP hourly and daily liquidity pic.twitter.com/luKbmmQMkZ — Cryptoinsightuk (@Cryptoinsightuk) September 19, 2025 If XRP holds the current support and volume increases, those higher levels may come into play. Below current prices, the next low-liquidity area sits near $2.8, which may draw attention if the market weakens. For now, XRP remains inside a tight structure with growing interest from both traders and institutions. The post XRP Targets $15 as ETF Buzz and Bullish Charts Align appeared first on CryptoPotato .

title: Solana (SOL) Founder Anatoly Yakovenko Issues Serious Bitcoin (BTC) Warning! "In 5 Years…"
body: Solana (SOL) founder Anatoly Yakovenko, who stands out with his bold statements, spoke about Bitcoin. Stating that quantum technology is advancing rapidly, Solana founder warned the Bitcoin (BTC) community. Speaking at the 2025 All-In Summit, Yakovenko urged the Bitcoin community to accelerate efforts to protect against quantum attacks, arguing that a major breakthrough in quantum computing could come much sooner than expected. Accordingly, Yakovenko stated that there is a “50/50” chance of a breakthrough in quantum computing by 2030, and said that the Bitcoin community should “speed things up.” Yakovenko warned that quantum computing could break Bitcoin's ECDSA within 5 years and stated that quantum-resistant signatures should be adopted. “There is an urgent need to migrate Bitcoin’s cryptographic infrastructure to quantum-resistant signatures. There will be a major quantum breakthrough in 5 years. Quantum computers will theoretically be able to solve Bitcoin's existing elliptic curve digital signature algorithm (ECDSA). That's why Bitcoin needs to move fast to surpass quantum by 2030.” Anatoly Yakovenko said that in response to quantum risks, Solana has taken a proactive step by introducing Winternitz Vault, a quantum-safe security feature. According to Yakovenko, the solution uses hash-based Winternitz One-Time Signatures (WOTS) that generate a new cryptographic key for each transaction. This approach minimizes the exposure of public keys that could be targeted by quantum attacks. It is predicted that quantum computers will eventually be able to break today's encryption, creating security concerns for users in the blockchain industry. *This is not investment advice. Continue Reading: Solana (SOL) Founder Anatoly Yakovenko Issues Serious Bitcoin (BTC) Warning! "In 5 Years…"

title: Aave Price Prediction: Unlocking AAVE’s Remarkable Future Potential
body: BitcoinWorld Aave Price Prediction: Unlocking AAVE’s Remarkable Future Potential Are you looking to understand the future trajectory of one of the most prominent decentralized finance (DeFi) protocols? Our in-depth Aave price prediction delves into the factors that could shape AAVE price movements from 2025 through 2030. Aave has cemented its position as a leader in DeFi lending , offering a robust platform for borrowing and lending digital assets. But what does the future hold for this innovative Aave crypto ? This article provides a thorough cryptocurrency analysis to help you navigate its potential. What is Aave and Why Does it Matter for DeFi Lending? Aave stands as a cornerstone of the decentralized finance ecosystem, operating as an open-source, non-custodial liquidity protocol. Essentially, it allows users to lend out their cryptocurrencies to earn interest, or borrow cryptocurrencies by providing collateral. This system removes the need for traditional financial intermediaries, making financial services more accessible and transparent. The significance of Aave in DeFi lending cannot be overstated. It introduced several innovations, including flash loans – uncollateralized loans that must be borrowed and repaid within the same blockchain transaction. This feature, alongside its diverse range of supported assets and robust governance model, has positioned Aave as a critical infrastructure layer for the broader DeFi space. Its continued development and adoption are key indicators for any Aave price prediction . Key Features of the Aave Protocol: Decentralized Lending & Borrowing: Users interact directly with smart contracts, not banks. Flash Loans: Unique uncollateralized loans for arbitrage and other opportunities. Diverse Asset Support: Supports a wide array of cryptocurrencies for lending and borrowing. Staking & Governance: AAVE token holders can stake their tokens for security and participate in protocol governance. Variable & Stable Interest Rates: Flexibility for borrowers to choose their preferred rate type. AAVE’s Historical Performance: A Foundation for Aave Price Prediction To make an informed Aave price prediction , it is crucial to examine its past performance. The AAVE price has experienced significant volatility, characteristic of the broader cryptocurrency market. Launched initially as LEND, the token migrated to AAVE in 2020, accompanied by a token swap and a significant upgrade to the protocol. During the 2021 bull run, AAVE saw impressive gains, reaching an all-time high that solidified its market presence. This period highlighted the market’s growing interest in DeFi lending solutions. However, like many digital assets, AAVE also experienced downturns during bear markets, demonstrating the inherent risks and cyclical nature of crypto investments. Understanding these historical cycles is fundamental for any robust cryptocurrency analysis . AAVE Price Milestones: 2017: Initial Coin Offering (ICO) of LEND token. 2020: LEND to AAVE token migration, launching Aave V2. 2021: Reached all-time highs amidst the DeFi boom. 2022: Navigated a challenging bear market, showcasing resilience. 2023-2024: Demonstrated recovery and continued protocol development. What Factors Influence AAVE Price Movements? The future AAVE price is not determined in a vacuum. A multitude of factors, both internal to the Aave protocol and external market forces, play a significant role. A comprehensive cryptocurrency analysis must consider these elements for an accurate Aave price prediction . 1. Market Sentiment and Broader Crypto Trends: The overall sentiment in the cryptocurrency market is a primary driver. Bull markets tend to lift most altcoins, including Aave crypto , while bear markets exert downward pressure. Macroeconomic factors, regulatory news, and institutional adoption also heavily influence this sentiment. 2. Aave Protocol Development and Innovation: Continuous upgrades, new features, and expansions to other blockchain networks (e.g., Aave V3’s multi-chain deployment) enhance Aave’s utility and competitive edge. Innovations like new collateral types or improved capital efficiency can directly impact demand for the AAVE token. 3. DeFi Lending Adoption and Growth: As DeFi lending becomes more mainstream, the total value locked (TVL) in protocols like Aave is likely to grow. Increased usage means more fees generated for the protocol and potentially higher demand for the AAVE token, which is used for governance and staking. 4. Regulatory Environment: Clarity or uncertainty in cryptocurrency regulations can significantly affect investor confidence and institutional participation. Favorable regulations could spur growth, while restrictive ones could hinder it. 5. Competition within DeFi: While Aave is a leader, it faces competition from other lending protocols. Its ability to innovate and maintain its market share against rivals is crucial for its long-term value proposition. Aave Price Prediction 2025: Will AAVE Price Hit $500? The question on many investors’ minds is: will AAVE price hit $500 in 2025? This target represents a significant increase from recent levels and depends on several bullish factors converging. Our Aave price prediction for 2025 considers both optimistic and conservative scenarios. Optimistic Scenario for AAVE in 2025: An optimistic outlook suggests that the broader crypto market experiences a strong bull run, potentially fueled by Bitcoin halving events and increased institutional adoption. In this scenario, DeFi lending continues its rapid expansion, with Aave maintaining its leading position and introducing further innovations (e.g., real-world asset integration, new stablecoin offerings). If Aave’s TVL sees substantial growth and the utility of the Aave crypto token for governance and staking increases, reaching $500 or even higher becomes a plausible, albeit ambitious, target. This would require sustained positive market sentiment and Aave’s continued dominance in the DeFi space. Conservative Scenario for AAVE in 2025: A more conservative Aave price prediction for 2025 might see AAVE consolidate its gains, perhaps reaching a range between $250-$400. This scenario assumes steady, but not explosive, growth in the DeFi sector, moderate market sentiment, and continued regulatory scrutiny. While Aave would remain a strong protocol, intense competition or unforeseen market headwinds could temper its upward trajectory. AAVE’s ability to retain users and attract new capital in a competitive environment will be key. Potential AAVE Price Range for 2025: Scenario Minimum Price Maximum Price Optimistic $350 $550+ Conservative $200 $400 Achieving $500 in 2025 is certainly within the realm of possibility under favorable market conditions and Aave’s continued execution. However, investors should be prepared for volatility. Aave Price Prediction 2026 – 2030: Long-Term Outlook for Aave Crypto Looking further into the future, the Aave price prediction for 2026-2030 requires a broader perspective on the evolution of decentralized finance and blockchain technology. The long-term outlook for Aave crypto remains strong, predicated on the continued growth and maturation of the DeFi ecosystem. 2026: Consolidation and Ecosystem Expansion After a potentially strong 2025, 2026 might see a period of consolidation or steady growth for AAVE price . Aave is likely to further expand its multi-chain presence, integrating with more Layer 2 solutions and other blockchain networks to enhance scalability and reduce transaction costs. Innovations in risk management and compliance within DeFi lending could also drive adoption. We might see AAVE trading in the range of $400-$700. 2027-2028: Mainstream Adoption and Institutional Influx By 2027-2028, if regulatory frameworks become clearer and institutional interest in DeFi intensifies, Aave could see significant capital inflows. The integration of real-world assets (RWAs) into DeFi protocols, a frontier Aave is actively exploring, could unlock massive liquidity. This period could see AAVE challenge previous all-time highs and potentially reach new milestones, possibly ranging from $600 to $1000 or more, depending on the overall market cycle. This hinges on successful mainstream integration and robust security measures. 2029-2030: Maturation and Global Financial Integration Towards the end of the decade, Aave could be a deeply embedded component of a global, decentralized financial system. Its role in providing liquidity and financial services could expand beyond traditional crypto users to a broader segment of the global population. The AAVE price would reflect its utility and the sheer volume of assets managed by the protocol. While precise figures are difficult to predict this far out, sustained growth and innovation could push AAVE into the four-figure range, potentially $800-$1500+, making it a cornerstone asset for long-term holders. This long-term cryptocurrency analysis suggests Aave’s enduring value proposition. Projected AAVE Price Ranges (2026-2030): Year Minimum Price Maximum Price 2026 $400 $700 2027 $600 $1000 2028 $750 $1200 2029 $800 $1400 2030 $900 $1500+ Is Aave Crypto a Good Investment? A Balanced Cryptocurrency Analysis Considering an investment in Aave crypto requires a balanced perspective, weighing its strengths against potential challenges. This cryptocurrency analysis aims to provide clarity for prospective investors. Benefits of Investing in Aave: Market Leader in DeFi Lending: Aave has a proven track record and strong brand recognition in the DeFi space. Strong Fundamentals: A robust protocol, active development team, and a vibrant community. Innovation: Continual introduction of new features and expansion into new markets (e.g., V3, multi-chain). Real-World Utility: The AAVE token is integral to governance and security of a major DeFi protocol. Growth Potential of DeFi: The overall DeFi sector is still relatively young with significant room for expansion. Challenges and Risks for AAVE: Regulatory Uncertainty: The evolving regulatory landscape for DeFi could pose challenges. Smart Contract Risks: While audited, smart contracts always carry an inherent risk of bugs or exploits. Market Volatility: Like all cryptocurrencies, AAVE is subject to extreme price fluctuations. Competition: Aave faces strong competition from other established and emerging DeFi protocols. Scalability Issues: While improving, Ethereum’s gas fees and network congestion can still impact user experience. For those considering a long-term position, Aave’s established position and continuous innovation make it a compelling asset within the DeFi sector. However, it’s crucial to acknowledge the risks. Actionable Insights: Navigating Your Aave Crypto Investment Based on our Aave price prediction and cryptocurrency analysis , here are some actionable insights for potential investors: Do Your Own Research (DYOR): Always conduct your own thorough research before making any investment decisions. Understand the technology, team, and market dynamics. Consider Long-Term Potential: Aave’s strength lies in its fundamental role in DeFi lending . Short-term price swings are common, but the long-term vision for decentralized finance is where its true potential lies. Diversify Your Portfolio: Do not put all your capital into a single asset. Diversification helps mitigate risk. Stay Informed: Keep up-to-date with Aave’s protocol developments, broader DeFi news, and regulatory changes. Risk Management: Only invest what you can afford to lose. Set clear entry and exit strategies. Conclusion: The Remarkable Future of Aave Our comprehensive Aave price prediction for 2025, 2026, and beyond paints a picture of a resilient and innovative protocol with significant growth potential. While the journey for AAVE price will undoubtedly involve volatility, its foundational role in DeFi lending , continuous development, and expanding ecosystem position it strongly for the future. The question of whether AAVE price will hit $500 in 2025 appears plausible under optimistic market conditions, and even higher targets are conceivable in the long run, as our cryptocurrency analysis suggests. As the world increasingly embraces decentralized financial services, Aave is poised to remain a critical player, offering remarkable opportunities for those who understand its value proposition. title: AVAX rallies to 3-month peak on network, DeFi growth hype
body: Avalanche’s native token AVAX responded to the latest news of the network’s growth, rallying to a three-month peak above $35 as it repositioned itself for DeFi. Trading volumes also rose to the highest level in three months, at $2.12B. AVAX also went through a short squeeze, liquidating short positions above $35. The latest rally also surprised Hyperliquid whales, who were betting on a price slide. A total of 17 whales hold small gains or unrealized losses, while only 11 whales are long on AVAX. For now, the token seems to have finished the short liquidations, and a downturn is possible to attack liquidity accrued for long positions at around $33. AVAX open interest is also close to its peak, at $924M, with over 73% of traders picking a long position. The token is one of the relatively old assets from the 2021 bull market, which is still reinventing its network and DeFi capabilities. AVAX continued its expansion after the recent plans to launch a $1B treasury based on discounted tokens from the Avalanche Foundation. Additionally, the chain saw increased activity, with over 78K daily active addresses. AVAX rallies on rapid USDC inflows USDC on AVAX is the most rapidly expanding stablecoin version, based on Token Terminal data . For the past month, the chain expanded its supply by 65.9%, for a total of over $1.2B in USDC. In total, Avalanche carries over $2.4B in various stablecoins, with a total value locked of $2.26B. One of the chief drivers of expansion is the chain’s version of Aave, which grew its value locked by over 33% in the past month. Recently, Aave C-Chain also entered the top 5 of networks with the biggest inflows, with a net $6.3M added in the past 24 hours. C-Chain was surpassed by BNB Smart Chain, just behind Ethereum and Solana. For the past three months, over $30M net flowed into Avalanche C-Chain, with most of the funds originating on Ethereum. Ethereum is the biggest source of inflows into Avalanche C-Chain. | Source: Artemis While AVAX sees outflows for other stablecoins, USDC is growing in dominance, with around 50% of the chain’s total stablecoin supply. Avalanche achieves the highest APY on Aave Avalanche C-Chain is being chosen by users for its higher yield opportunities. The chain’s Aave protocol offers up to 5.22% APY on USDC, comparably higher than chains like Arbitrum . Aave protocol uses the same approach but still has different yields on various chains. Avalanche has achieved the highest yield, which is becoming the main attractor for USDC usage. On Avalanche, EURC tokens on Aave can earn up to 9% yield, while USDC earns 5.22%. EURC recently reached up to 17.9% in yield, showing a potential niche market with higher volatility. USDC deposits are relatively stable, based on the offered current APY. The stablecoin arbitrage conditions may change, but for now, Avalanche is getting a boost from demand for passive yield. title: Aptos Price Prediction: Unlocking the Future of APT Coin’s Explosive Growth
body: BitcoinWorld Aptos Price Prediction: Unlocking the Future of APT Coin’s Explosive Growth Are you looking to navigate the volatile yet exciting world of cryptocurrency investments? Specifically, are you eyeing Aptos crypto and wondering about its future trajectory? You’re not alone. As the digital asset space continues to evolve, investors are constantly seeking insights into which projects hold the most promise. Today, we’re diving deep into the Aptos price prediction for the coming years, exploring whether the highly anticipated $25 mark is truly within reach for the APT coin during the next crypto altseason . Buckle up, because we’re about to unpack the potential that could define Aptos’s journey. What Makes Aptos a Contender in the Blockchain Arena? Before we project future prices, it’s crucial to understand the foundation upon which Aptos is built. Aptos emerged from the shadows of Meta’s Diem project, bringing with it a team of highly experienced engineers and a vision for a scalable, secure, and upgradeable blockchain. Its core innovation lies in the Move programming language and a parallel execution engine, designed to overcome the notorious scalability issues that plague many legacy blockchains. This focus on advanced blockchain scalability is a significant differentiator. Here’s what sets Aptos apart: Move Language: A Rust-based programming language that prioritizes safety and security, making it ideal for smart contract development and preventing common exploits. Parallel Execution: Aptos can process multiple transactions simultaneously, significantly increasing throughput and reducing latency compared to sequential execution models. Modular Architecture: Its design allows for frequent upgrades and optimizations without disrupting the network, ensuring adaptability and future-proofing. High Transaction Throughput: Theoretically capable of processing over 100,000 transactions per second (TPS), positioning it as a strong competitor to established networks. These technological advancements are critical drivers for the long-term viability and potential growth of the APT coin . Understanding Aptos (APT) Coin’s Journey So Far The APT coin launched with significant hype, experiencing considerable price volatility characteristic of new, high-profile cryptocurrency projects. Like many altcoins, it has seen its share of highs and lows, influenced by broader market trends, investor sentiment, and specific project developments. Its initial public offering and subsequent performance have been closely watched by the crypto community, eager to see if it can live up to its ‘Solana killer’ moniker. Key aspects of APT’s historical performance: Initial Volatility: Post-launch, APT experienced sharp price movements, reflecting both speculative interest and market corrections. Market Cap Growth: Despite volatility, Aptos has consistently maintained a strong position in terms of market capitalization, indicating significant investor confidence. Ecosystem Development: Growth in decentralized applications (dApps), partnerships, and developer activity within the Aptos ecosystem directly impacts the demand for APT. What Factors Will Drive the Aptos Price Prediction for 2025 and Beyond? Predicting cryptocurrency prices is inherently challenging due to the multitude of influencing factors. However, for a comprehensive Aptos price prediction , we must consider both internal project developments and external market dynamics. Understanding these elements is key to assessing the likelihood of the APT coin hitting ambitious targets like $25. 1. Broader Market Sentiment and the Crypto Altseason The performance of any altcoin, including Aptos, is heavily tied to the overall health of the cryptocurrency market. A bullish market, often spearheaded by Bitcoin’s performance, typically ushers in a crypto altseason where altcoins experience significant price surges. Conversely, bear markets can pull down even the most promising projects. During an altseason, capital often flows from Bitcoin into altcoins as investors seek higher returns. If Aptos can maintain its technological edge and ecosystem growth during such a period, it stands to benefit immensely. 2. Ecosystem Growth and Adoption of Aptos Crypto The true value of a blockchain lies in its utility and adoption. For Aptos crypto , this means the continuous development of dApps, integration with various services, and increasing user activity. More developers building on Aptos, more users transacting on the network, and more partnerships forming will drive demand for the APT token, which is used for transaction fees, staking, and governance. Developer Activity: A thriving developer community indicates a healthy and evolving ecosystem. User Base Expansion: Growth in active addresses and transaction volume signifies real-world utility. Strategic Partnerships: Collaborations with enterprises or other blockchain projects can expand Aptos’s reach and use cases. 3. Technological Advancements and Blockchain Scalability Aptos’s core promise is superior blockchain scalability . Continued innovation in this area, along with improvements in security and decentralization, will be vital. If Aptos can consistently deliver on its technological roadmap and maintain its performance advantage over competitors, it will solidify its position as a leading Layer 1 blockchain. Any breakthroughs or challenges in its parallel execution, Move language enhancements, or network upgrades will directly impact investor confidence and, consequently, the Aptos price prediction . 4. Macroeconomic Factors and Regulatory Landscape Global economic conditions, such as inflation rates, interest rates, and geopolitical events, can significantly influence investor appetite for risk assets like cryptocurrencies. Additionally, the evolving regulatory landscape across different jurisdictions can create both opportunities and challenges for projects like Aptos. Favorable regulations could spur adoption, while restrictive ones could hinder growth. Aptos Price Prediction 2025: What to Expect? Looking ahead to 2025, several analysts believe that if the broader crypto market enters a bull cycle, the APT coin could experience substantial growth. The year 2025 is often anticipated to be a strong year for altcoins, following Bitcoin’s halving event, which historically precedes market rallies. For a conservative Aptos price prediction for 2025, we might see APT trading in the range of $10 to $18 . However, under extremely bullish conditions, fueled by a strong crypto altseason and significant ecosystem developments, the price could potentially test higher resistance levels. Reaching $20-$25 within 2025 would require exceptional market momentum and widespread adoption. Factors influencing 2025: Continued dApp proliferation on Aptos. Successful execution of roadmap milestones. Overall bullish sentiment in the crypto market. Increasing institutional interest in high-performance blockchains. Year Minimum Price (USD) Average Price (USD) Maximum Price (USD) 2025 (Conservative) $10.00 $14.00 $18.00 2025 (Optimistic) $15.00 $20.00 $25.00+ Aptos Price Prediction 2026 – 2030: Long-Term Outlook for APT Coin Projecting further into the future, the Aptos price prediction for 2026 to 2030 becomes even more speculative, yet grounded in the potential for widespread adoption and the continuous evolution of blockchain scalability solutions. By this period, Aptos would have had several years to mature, prove its technology, and establish itself as a dominant player in the Layer 1 space. 2026: Consolidation and Growth Following a potential bull run in 2025, 2026 might see a period of consolidation or continued growth, depending on market cycles. If Aptos successfully expands its ecosystem and maintains its technical edge, the APT coin could comfortably trade in the $15-$30 range. Sustained institutional interest and real-world use cases will be crucial. 2027-2028: Maturation and Broader Adoption As the crypto market matures, projects with strong fundamentals and proven utility will likely thrive. Aptos’s focus on high throughput and low latency makes it attractive for enterprise solutions and mainstream applications. If Aptos becomes a go-to platform for specific industries or a significant portion of the Web3 economy, its value could appreciate substantially. Prices could potentially range from $25-$50 , especially if a new altseason emerges. 2029-2030: Dominance and Innovation By the end of the decade, Aptos aims to be a leader in the blockchain space. Its ability to continuously innovate and adapt to new technological demands will determine its long-term success. If it manages to attract a massive user base and a vast developer community, challenging even established giants, the Aptos price prediction could see the APT coin reaching figures between $50 and $100+ . This ambitious target relies on Aptos fulfilling its potential as a highly scalable and robust blockchain. This is the burning question for many investors. The possibility of APT coin hitting $25 during the next crypto altseason is certainly within the realm of possibility, but it hinges on a confluence of factors. For Aptos to reach this milestone: Strong Bull Market: A significant overall market rally, similar to previous altseasons, is essential. Aptos Outperformance: APT needs to outperform many of its peers, attracting a disproportionate amount of capital flow. Ecosystem Milestones: Major announcements, successful dApp launches, and significant partnerships must generate positive sentiment and utility. Sustained Demand: There must be continuous buying pressure from both retail and institutional investors. While challenging, the technological superiority and strong backing of Aptos give it a credible path to such a valuation during a robust altseason. The project’s focus on blockchain scalability could make it a prime candidate for capital rotation when investors seek high-growth alternatives to Bitcoin and Ethereum. What Are the Challenges and Risks for Aptos Crypto? No investment is without risk, and Aptos crypto is no exception. While its potential is undeniable, several challenges could impact its growth trajectory: Competition: The Layer 1 blockchain space is fiercely competitive, with established players like Ethereum, Solana, and newer entrants vying for market share. Execution Risk: Delivering on ambitious technological roadmaps can be difficult, and any delays or setbacks could dampen investor confidence. Tokenomics and Inflation: The long-term effects of APT’s tokenomics, including its inflation schedule and vesting periods, need to be carefully monitored. Security Concerns: As with any blockchain, the risk of hacks or vulnerabilities remains a constant threat, which could severely impact trust and price. Regulatory Uncertainty: Unfavorable regulatory actions could restrict Aptos’s growth or adoption in key markets. Is Aptos (APT) a Good Investment? Actionable Insights Deciding whether APT coin is a good investment depends on your risk tolerance, investment horizon, and belief in the project’s long-term vision. Aptos certainly presents a compelling case due to its technological foundation and experienced team. Here are some actionable insights: Do Your Own Research (DYOR): Always delve into the project’s whitepaper, team, roadmap, and community sentiment before investing. Consider Market Cycles: Timing your entry during a bearish period or accumulating during dips can be a strategic approach for long-term holders. Monitor Ecosystem Growth: Keep an eye on the number of dApps, transaction volume, and active users on the Aptos network. This is a strong indicator of utility and adoption. Diversify Your Portfolio: Avoid putting all your capital into a single asset. Diversification helps mitigate risk. Stay Informed: Follow Aptos’s official announcements, developer updates, and general crypto news to stay ahead. Conclusion: The Promising Future of Aptos The Aptos price prediction for 2025, 2026, and up to 2030 paints a picture of significant potential growth for the APT coin . Its innovative approach to blockchain scalability , coupled with a robust technical foundation and a strong team, positions it as a formidable contender in the Layer 1 space. While reaching $25 this crypto altseason is an ambitious target, it’s certainly achievable if market conditions align and Aptos continues its impressive ecosystem expansion and technological development. Investors looking for a high-growth asset with strong fundamentals should keep Aptos on their radar, understanding that volatility is part of the journey. Conflux experienced significant losses, falling below $0.10 by mid-May 2022 and closing the year at $0.02198 after a nearly 90% annual decline. Starting the year 2023 at an all-time low of $0.02191, CFX rose above $0.30 in February following a partnership with China Telecom and peaked above $0.40 several times in March and April. In December, the price of CFX dropped toward the low of $0.15. Conflux began trading at $0.1561 in January 2025 and hovered between $0.144 and $0.15. By the end of April, the price of CFX surged toward $0.086; however, it retraced later. In May, CFX strongly surged and hovered above $0.1. However, buyers failed to maintain the level, resulting in a drop toward $0.072 by the month’s end. By the end of June, CFX price surged toward $0.077. In July, CFX made a strong surge as it moved toward $0.28. In August, the price of CFX surged toward $0.21 but later declined toward $0.17 in early September.

The Influx of Capital and the Coexistence of Risks: The Other Side of Solana’s Investment Logic
body: Since 2025, new trends have emerged in the flow of funds in the crypto market. Bitcoin’s post-halving performance remains a source of excitement, while the expansion of Ethereum’s Layer 2 solution is also attracting institutional attention. Another rapidly emerging trend is Solana (SOL) . Leveraging its efficient network performance and rich application ecosystem, SOL has rapidly accumulated significant transaction volume and developer activity, becoming one of the most discussed public chains in the market. Mitigating Risks As Solana Development Continues However, price volatility remains an unavoidable reality. Whether it’s short-term speculation or medium- to long-term trends, SOL’s price exhibits significant uncertainty. This characteristic means that simply hoarding and waiting often fails to generate stable returns, while high-frequency trading requires significant investment and experience. Consequently, investors are beginning to consider: how can they benefit from the Solana ecosystem’s development while mitigating the risks associated with price fluctuations? Cloud mining is gradually becoming one of the answers. Unlike traditional self-built mining machines, cloud mining uses hash rate contracts, allowing investors to participate in blockchain networks without incurring hardware, electricity, and maintenance costs. More importantly, profits are often settled periodically, for example, every 24 hours, which allows for more regular funding arrangements. For investors who prefer to hold onto their coins, this model is more like a financial investment tool, effectively adding a predictable cash flow to their portfolio. Furthermore, cloud mining platforms typically distribute hash rate across data centers around the world, mitigating policy or energy risks associated with a single region and improving overall stability. As the industry gradually moves towards compliance and transparency, the differentiated value of platforms is becoming increasingly prominent. OPTO Miner is a representative example. Since its legal registration in the UK in 2018, the platform has maintained stable operations under government oversight. Leveraging hardware from top manufacturers such as Bitmain, Shenma Mining, and Canaan Creative, it builds an efficient computing system, ensuring long-term stable output. With over one million real users worldwide, OPTO Miner has established a market reputation as compliant, transparent, and robust. In terms of security and service, the platform incorporates multiple protection mechanisms from McAfee and Cloudflare, along with distributed cold wallets and multi-signature security to safeguard assets. It supports payments and settlements in over ten major currencies, including BTC, ETH, XRP, DOGE, SOL, and USDT. A daily settlement mechanism ensures a clear and consistent payout cycle. Flexible contract structures allow investors to choose the appropriate allocation based on their funds and goals, while 24/7 customer service further lowers the barrier to entry for new investors. Enhancing Security with Cloud Mining As the Solana ecosystem continues to expand, investors’ demand for stability and security becomes increasingly prominent. Cloud mining is not a substitute for speculative trading, but rather a contractual, financialized form of participation. In this process, OPTO Miner, leveraging its regulatory compliance background, technological advantages, and long-term operational experience, has gradually become a representative platform for this industry trend. While the future market remains highly uncertain, cyclical cash flow and compliant operating models are increasingly becoming the anchors investors rely on amidst volatility. Solana’s development demonstrates the potential for innovation in public blockchains, while compliant platforms like OPTO Miner offer investors a more robust choice between risk and opportunity. As the crypto industry accelerates its progress towards compliance and transparency, platforms with long-term operational experience and accumulated technical expertise are more likely to stand out. OPTO Miner is a prime example of this. Its security mechanisms, compliance foundation, and multi-currency support not only address the core concerns of investors but also provide a valuable development model for the entire industry. The case study in this article is referenced from the OPTO Miner official website. The post The Influx of Capital and the Coexistence of Risks: The Other Side of Solana’s Investment Logic appeared first on Cryptonews .

title: Binance BuildKey TGE: Phenomenal Success as RIVER Project Attracts Over $100M
body: BitcoinWorld Binance BuildKey TGE: Phenomenal Success as RIVER Project Attracts Over $100M The cryptocurrency world recently witnessed a groundbreaking event with the launch of the first Binance BuildKey TGE , marking a significant milestone for Binance Wallet. This innovative approach to token generation has already demonstrated immense potential, capturing the attention of thousands of participants and drawing substantial capital into the nascent RIVER project. Understanding the Binance BuildKey TGE : How Does it Work? The Binance BuildKey TGE introduces a novel mechanism for project funding and early token access. Essentially, it allows users to participate in a project’s token launch by depositing BNB within a specific window. These deposits then translate into “BuildKeys,” which are unique credentials representing a participant’s allocation in the upcoming token distribution. This process offers several key advantages: Early Access: Participants gain an early stake in promising projects. Transparency: The allocation process is clearly defined through BuildKeys. Liquidity: BuildKeys themselves become tradable assets even before the official token launch. The RIVER project was the inaugural offering under this new framework, setting a high bar for future events within the Binance BuildKey TGE ecosystem. The RIVER Project’s Phenomenal Binance BuildKey TGE Success The launch of RIVER via the Binance BuildKey TGE on September 19th was nothing short of spectacular. Within a mere two-hour window, the event attracted an astonishing level of interest and investment. A total of 33,400 eager participants contributed over $100 million in BNB, showcasing incredible community engagement. What makes these figures even more impressive is the strict deposit limit: a maximum of 3 BNB per user. This limitation ensured broad participation rather than domination by a few large investors. The event recorded an oversubscription rate of an astounding 99,329.94%, highlighting the overwhelming demand and excitement surrounding this new Binance BuildKey TGE model. The Power of BuildKeys in the Binance BuildKey TGE Ecosystem Immediately following the deposit phase, the BuildKeys were distributed to participants. These aren’t just static receipts; they are dynamic, tradable assets. BuildKeys instantly became available on the Aspecta pre-market platform, allowing early participants to realize potential gains or adjust their positions even before RIVER tokens officially launched. The pre-market trading activity provided an early glimpse into the project’s perceived value. The price of a BuildKey started at $0.011 and quickly surged to $0.09 within just seven minutes of trading. This rapid appreciation underscores the market’s confidence and the liquidity provided by the BuildKey mechanism. Ultimately, these credentials can be exchanged for the actual project tokens once the Binance BuildKey TGE is complete and the token goes live. Future Implications: What Does the Binance BuildKey TGE Mean for Token Launches? The success of the first Binance BuildKey TGE with the RIVER project offers crucial insights into the evolving landscape of cryptocurrency fundraising. This model appears to effectively balance broad participation with market-driven valuation through pre-market trading of BuildKeys. It provides a unique blend of initial capital raising and early price discovery. For users, it presents a new avenue for engaging with promising projects and potentially benefiting from early-stage growth. For projects, it offers a robust platform for launching tokens with significant community backing and immediate liquidity. As the crypto space matures, innovative mechanisms like the Binance BuildKey TGE will likely play a pivotal role in shaping how new ventures secure funding and distribute their tokens. The phenomenal debut of the Binance BuildKey TGE with the RIVER project has undeniably set a new benchmark for token generation events. By fostering widespread participation, enabling pre-market liquidity, and attracting substantial capital, this innovative approach has demonstrated its power to revolutionize how new crypto projects come to life. It’s a testament to the dynamic and ever-evolving nature of the blockchain ecosystem, promising exciting opportunities for both investors and developers alike. Frequently Asked Questions about Binance BuildKey TGE Here are some common questions about the Binance BuildKey TGE and its implications: What is a BuildKey? A BuildKey is a digital credential representing a participant’s allocation in a specific token generation event (TGE) on Binance Wallet. It can be traded on pre-market platforms before the official token launch or exchanged for the actual project tokens. How did the RIVER project’s BuildKey TGE perform? The RIVER project’s BuildKey TGE was exceptionally successful, attracting over $100 million in BNB from 33,400 participants in just two hours, with an oversubscription rate exceeding 99,000%. Can BuildKeys be traded? Yes, BuildKeys are designed to be immediately tradable on pre-market platforms like Aspecta, allowing participants to manage their positions and realize potential gains before the project’s official token launch. What is the maximum deposit limit for the Binance BuildKey TGE? For the RIVER project, the maximum deposit was limited to 3 BNB per user, promoting broader community participation. What are the benefits of participating in a Binance BuildKey TGE? Benefits include early access to promising projects, the ability to trade your allocation (BuildKey) before the token launch, and participation in a transparent and community-focused fundraising model like the Binance BuildKey TGE . The success of the Binance BuildKey TGE marks an exciting chapter in crypto fundraising. Don’t miss out on future insights and analyses! title: IG Group closes $117.41M acquisition of Australian crypto exchange
body: On Friday, the UK trading platform IG Group expanded its footprint in the Asia-Pacific region by acquiring Australian digital asset exchange Independent Reserve for AUD178 million ($117.41 million). The Sydney-based company offers multi-currency trading in 34 cryptocurrencies in Australia and Singapore. IG maintained that Independent Reserve’s management and staff are expected to remain with the company, with a collective 30% shareholding at completion. The group said it will retain the Australian exchange’s brand and incorporate it into IG’s trading platforms in Australia and Singapore. IG holds 70% of Independent Reserve The British company revealed that it had purchased an initial 70% of the Independent Reserve for AUD109.6 million. The amount will exclude an expected share of acquired surplus cash of AUD8.4 million. The deal also includes an additional AUD15 million based on the firm’s financial 2026 performance. It will lead to a collective 70% ownership of AUD124.6 million. The UK trading company also has a call option to buy the remaining stake based on Independent Reserve’s performance in the financial years 2027 and 2028. IG said the remaining 30% stake amounts to AUD160.5 million, bringing the total payment of the entire Australian company below AUD285.1 million. IG Group expects the deal to include purchases in cash, earnings per share, accretive after two years, with a return on invested capital above IG’s weighted average cost of capital between financial year 2029 and 2030. IG said the deal will close in early 2026 once approved by Australian and Singapore regulators. Independent Reserve CEO Adrian Przelozny mentioned that the deal gives the company a bigger platform to grow while maintaining its secure, regulated trading goal. IG’s shares are down 2.44% to 1,075.80 pence on Friday. The deal comes as Independent Reserve reported a surge of 88% in revenue to AUD35.5 million in the year ended June 30. The company also saw AUD9.9 million in earnings before interest, tax, depreciation, and amortization. IG Group also announced Friday that it is revising its definitions of active customers and first traders. The company is also introducing funded customers to gauge their performance. According to the trading platform, the initiative aligns definitions across the Group and will show IG’s growth strategy. Starting from Q1 2026, active customers, first trades, and funded customers will be revealed every reporting period. Active customers represent users who opened or closed a position during a month or held a position at the end of the month. First trades include those who place their first trade in the reporting period, while funded customers are those with a cash balance or holding assets at the end of the month. The Group also continues its share buyback programme, which launched on September 4. The company instructed Morgan Stanley & Co. International to lead a 125 million euro program until 30 January 2026. Purchased shares will be held in treasury and are subject to share price performance and other capital demands. IG set the maximum number of shares available for purchase under the initiative at 23,831,794. IG Group launches crypto trading in the UK IG Group introduced crypto trading in Britain in June, allowing traders to trade crypto, stocks, indices, ETFs, commodities, and FX on the platform. The company became the first UK-listed business to allow digital asset trading in the country. The crypto trading initiative is backed by crypto asset firm Uphold, which is fully integrated across IG’s platform and IG Invest app. The digital asset firm will be in charge of executing all customer transactions and providing pricing data. Uphold’s CEO, Simon McLoughlin, said the company wants to give people better access to virtual currencies so they can participate in the evolving financial world. Bitcoin Investment: ZOOZ Power Unveils Bold $180M Strategy
body: BitcoinWorld Bitcoin Investment: ZOOZ Power Unveils Bold $180M Strategy In a surprising and bold move that has captured the attention of both the financial and cryptocurrency worlds, ZOOZ Power, a company at the forefront of electric vehicle (EV) charging infrastructure, has announced a massive Bitcoin investment strategy. This isn’t a small foray into digital assets; the company has approved a staggering $180 million private placement, with a significant portion – approximately 95% – earmarked for purchasing BTC. This strategic pivot signals a growing confidence in cryptocurrencies as a legitimate treasury asset among publicly traded companies. What’s Driving ZOOZ Power’s Bold Bitcoin Investment? ZOOZ Power (Nasdaq: ZOOZ) is primarily known for its innovative technology in the EV charging sector. Their decision to allocate such substantial capital to a Bitcoin investment strategy, approved at a special shareholders’ meeting, marks a pivotal moment for the company. This plan to raise $180 million was first unveiled in late July. The subsequent approval underscores a deliberate shift in the company’s financial strategy. Many analysts believe that companies like ZOOZ Power are looking to digital assets for several reasons: Diversification: Adding non-traditional assets to their balance sheet. Inflation Hedge: Protecting capital against the devaluation of fiat currencies. Potential for High Returns: Capitalizing on Bitcoin’s historical growth trajectory. This move positions ZOOZ Power among a growing list of corporations exploring the benefits of holding cryptocurrencies. How Will ZOOZ Power Execute This Massive Bitcoin Investment? The approved $180 million will be raised through a private placement. This financing method involves selling shares or other securities directly to a select group of investors, rather than through a public offering. Once these funds are successfully secured, ZOOZ Power intends to proceed with its large-scale acquisition of BTC. While specific details on the execution method are yet to be fully disclosed, companies typically utilize reputable cryptocurrency exchanges or over-the-counter (OTC) desks for such substantial purchases. This approach helps to minimize market impact and ensure efficient execution. The scale of this Bitcoin investment suggests a long-term strategic commitment, rather than a short-term speculative play. It also raises important questions regarding asset custody and security, crucial aspects for any company holding significant digital assets. Exploring the Benefits and Risks of Corporate Bitcoin Investment ZOOZ Power’s decision to pursue a substantial Bitcoin investment strategy comes with both exciting opportunities and notable challenges. Understanding these aspects is crucial for stakeholders and market observers. Potential Opportunities: Asset Appreciation: Bitcoin has historically demonstrated significant price growth, offering a potential boost to the company’s treasury. Inflation Protection: As a scarce digital asset, Bitcoin can serve as a hedge against inflation and currency debasement. Market Differentiation: This bold move can attract new, crypto-savvy investors and generate considerable media attention. Future-Proofing: Embracing digital assets aligns the company with evolving financial landscapes and technological innovation. Potential Risks: Price Volatility: Bitcoin’s price can experience dramatic swings, potentially impacting ZOOZ Power’s financial statements. Regulatory Uncertainty: The evolving global regulatory environment for cryptocurrencies could introduce unforeseen challenges. Security Concerns: Holding large amounts of BTC requires robust cybersecurity measures to prevent theft or loss. Shareholder Sentiment: Not all shareholders may be comfortable with the inherent risks associated with cryptocurrency holdings. Companies considering a similar path must implement comprehensive risk management frameworks and transparent communication strategies to navigate these complexities effectively. A New Era for Corporate Treasury? ZOOZ Power’s approval of a $180 million private placement for a significant Bitcoin investment is more than just a financial transaction; it’s a powerful statement. This move by an electric vehicle charging infrastructure company highlights the increasing mainstream acceptance and strategic consideration of digital assets in corporate finance. It suggests that Bitcoin is no longer solely the domain of individual investors or specialized crypto firms but is evolving into a recognized treasury asset for diverse industries. As ZOOZ Power embarks on this innovative financial journey, the corporate world will undoubtedly be watching closely. This decision could pave the way for more companies to explore similar avenues, further integrating cryptocurrencies into the global economic fabric and potentially redefining traditional treasury management strategies. Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs) Q1: What is ZOOZ Power’s primary business? A1: ZOOZ Power (Nasdaq: ZOOZ) specializes in developing and deploying innovative electric vehicle (EV) charging infrastructure solutions. Q2: How much money is ZOOZ Power planning to invest in Bitcoin? A2: ZOOZ Power has approved a plan to raise $180 million through a private placement, with approximately 95% of those funds intended for a Bitcoin investment. Q3: Why is an EV charging company investing in Bitcoin? A3: Companies often invest in Bitcoin for reasons like balance sheet diversification, as a hedge against inflation, and to potentially benefit from its long-term capital appreciation, viewing it as a strategic treasury asset. Q4: What are the main risks associated with this corporate Bitcoin investment strategy? A4: Key risks include Bitcoin’s high price volatility, evolving regulatory uncertainty, the need for robust security measures for digital asset custody, and potential concerns from shareholders regarding the risk profile. Q5: Has any other publicly traded company made a similar move? A5: Yes, several publicly traded companies, such as MicroStrategy and Tesla, have previously announced significant allocations of their treasury assets into Bitcoin. What do you think about ZOOZ Power’s bold move into Bitcoin? Is this the future of corporate finance? Share your thoughts on social media and let us know if you believe this is a smart strategic decision! title: Laos Considers Using Excess Hydropower for Cryptocurrency Mining
body: Key Highlights Laos aims to monetize excess hydropower with cryptocurrency mining Dams have displaced thousands and disrupted rivers and fisheries High public debt and inflation create risks for the digital economy plan Laos Looks to Turn Excess Hydropower into Crypto Profits Laos is exploring the use of excess hydroelectric power for cryptocurrency mining, sparking both international interest and domestic criticism, according to media reports . The country’s long-running dam construction program has created a surplus of electricity while leaving Laos with billions of dollars in debt. Authorities are now seeking to monetize this excess through the energy-intensive crypto industry. A report by the state-run Vientiane Times following a government meeting noted policymakers are considering “long-term economic opportunities,” including digital asset mining, which could turn surplus electricity into economic value. Critics warn of serious social and environmental consequences. Dams have disrupted rivers, reduced downstream harvests, damaged fisheries, and forced thousands to relocate. Vitoon Permpongsakaroen, director of the Mekong Energy and Ecology Network, emphasized that the initiative is driven not by domestic need but by debt pressures. Hydropower is also seasonal; during the dry season, Laos often buys electricity from neighboring countries, particularly Thailand. According to Pianporn Dites of International Rivers, promises to compensate displaced communities have largely gone unfulfilled, leaving many worse off. Economic Ambitions Clash with Social and Environmental Concerns Despite criticism, the move has drawn attention from investors in the region. Laos aims to become a fully digital economy by 2030, licensing local crypto mining and trading platforms while attempting to regulate Chinese miners who moved operations to the country after China’s 2021 ban. In May 2023, Laos unveiled a digital economy strategy, focusing on blockchain, AI, IoT, and electronic finance. In August, state-owned Electricite du Laos announced it would cut power to crypto farms due to drought, export commitments, and unpaid debts. Risks remain high. The International Monetary Fund warned in November that “significant levels of public debt pose challenges to the medium-term economic outlook,” while inflation and a declining Kip, which has lost half its value against the US dollar over five years, add further strain. The situation is compounded by US tariffs, currently at 40% on Laotian exports, among the highest for Washington’s trading partners.

title: UK, EU bond traders warn regulators against locking in a new leverage rule
body: Bond traders in the UK and across Europe are warning regulators to think twice before locking in a new leverage rule. The Bank of England, with backing from global financial authorities, is pushing for mandatory minimum haircuts on repo deals involving government bonds. The traders, through the European Repo and Collateral Council, said the plan is risky, poorly thought out, and could blow up parts of the system that actually work. According to Bloomberg, the haircut rule would set a fixed minimum on how much value gets shaved off a bond when used as collateral in a repurchase agreement. The idea is to stop hedge funds from borrowing too much with too little risk. But the ERCC, speaking for about 120 financial institutions, said that slapping a single haircut formula on every deal doesn’t reflect how real trading works. BoE paper faces backlash from repo markets The Bank of Englan d flagged the issue in a consultation paper on gilt repo trades, where banks sometimes give “zero or near-zero” haircuts. The BoE claimed that could be a sign of “market failure.” But the ERCC pushed back, saying haircut levels alone don’t give a full picture of leverage or risk. The real story, the ERCC argued, lies in something called portfolio margining. That’s when a bank looks at a trader’s entire book of positions, not just the repo side, before deciding how much protection is needed. The group said , “It becomes difficult, if not impossible, to draw meaningful conclusions from transaction-level data on haircuts.” They added that haircut data doesn’t explain broader leverage or market risk and shouldn’t be treated like some kind of master switch for fixing the system. Citadel’s global head of government and regulatory policy, Stephen Berger, told a crowd at this week’s ISDA conference in London that regulators are misreading the numbers. “One of the mistakes that’s come from reading some of the existing data is there’s a lot of repo activities occurring with zero haircuts,” Stephen said. “But in fact those repos are being done as a part of an overall portfolio margining situation. There is actually collateral being held against those.” ERCC warns rule could drive traders out of repos The Financial Stability Board floated the idea last December, telling governments to consider hard limits on haircut sizes in bond repos where lenders were competing too aggressively. The BoE picked that up and moved ahead, but for traders, if regulators force haircuts too high, they’ll just walk away from repos altogether. The ERCC warned that interfering with repo pricing could “distort” the market, hurt efficiency, and push traders toward more shadowy tools like total-return swaps. Those products allow leverage too, but without the same level of transparency. So instead of solving a problem, regulators could just be pushing risk somewhere else. While regulators keep saying they want more clearing and transparency, the haircut rule is where the room splits. At the ISDA event, everyone agreed on moving more transactions to clearinghouses. But forcing haircuts? Not so much. Hedge funds and dealers say they already manage risk using collateral and cross-margining. Adding a fixed rule would just add cost, complexity, and more headaches. Meanwhile, across the Atlantic, U.S. Treasury yields jumped on Friday after the Fed made its first rate cut of the year. The 10-year Treasury climbed 3.1 basis points to hit 4.135%, briefly touching 4.145%. The 2-year yield hit 3.578% after peaking at 3.59%. The 30-year bond yield went up 2.7 basis points to land at 4.747%. That’s the highest for all three since September 5. One basis point equals 0.01%, and yields move in the opposite direction of bond prices. So when yields go up, borrowing gets tighter, and leverage gets more expensive. That pressure is already building without a haircut rule. But if the BoE’s plan goes ahead, it could hit traders from both sides at once. title: Popular Analyst Warns of a Sharp Drop for Bitcoin (BTC) and a Bullish Prediction for Ethereum (ETH)
body: There have been bullish predictions for Bitcoin for a long time, but now bearish rhetoric has started to emerge. At this point, IntoTheCryptoverse founder Benjamin Cowen predicted that Bitcoin could drop by 70% in the next bear market. He noted that Bitcoin follows the traditional 4-year bear-bull cycle based on the halving, and predicted that Bitcoin could fall by up to 70 percent after reaching an all-time high in the next bear market. Cowen said the scenario for such a large decline is not certain, but historical data suggests similar declines. In this context, Cowen stated that Bitcoin experienced declines of 94%, 87% and approximately 77% in past cycles, respectively, and argued that there would be no difference in this cycle. “This time it doesn't have to be different,” the analyst said, warning investors of a possible sharp decline of 70 percent. Cowen said that although he expects a sharp decline, Bitcoin will recover first and reach its peak. At this point, Cowen stated that if Bitcoin shows an uptrend in the fourth quarter, he would consider this cycle to follow a similar pattern. Cowen stated that he would make a profit with the rise in the fourth quarter, and added that he could wait until mid-2026 to re-enter the market. Ethereum (ETH) is More Likely to Rise! Finally, Cowen shared his analysis of Ethereum (ETH), saying that Ethereum may remain weak against Bitcoin in the short term but may recover towards the end of the market cycle. At this point, the analyst said that ETH will “struggle” against Bitcoin for a few more weeks but will outperform towards the end of the cycle. “Ethereum seems likely to outperform from now until the end of the cycle.” *This is not investment advice.
